GUrRRa BramaRe aka tu uBa sew GUrRati te acU rRIt aGUrRizwa juzUrRa juGUrRe guruBArasamAkrA Page b ntaScacAla ca juvUrRRa ca rAmA ki kecidA sizate stabDA BayAt kecidavUrRizu aGUrRizwAM kzatO kzmAYca tAvaSiSriyatAmuBO iti ca BawwiH GUrRitaH GUrRitavAn tatoraTo GUrRitabAn na rendra BA ka a kAdambarImadaviGUrRitalocanasya yuktaM hi lANgalaBftaH patanaM pfTivyAm udBawaH Bo vfkzAH parvatasTAH bahukusumayutA vAyunA GUrRa mAnA mahAnA vAyuneti hatO tftIyA sayakArapaWe RyantAv karmaRi SAnac karttari tftIyeti BedaH Rici GUrRayanni te ajuGUrRat ta nayanAnyaruRAni GUrRayan kumA GUrRayan madirAsvAdamadapAwalitadyutI mAGaH karmmaRi GUrRyate aGUrRi GUrRyamAnaH vAyunA GUrRyamAnAH mahAnA pAWAntaram GUrRRa pu GUrRayati ac gimA SAkaBede grIzmasundarake Sabdaca BrAnte tri BAve GaY BramaRe GUrRa Ric ac GUrRakArake rogaBede

Garma pu Garati aNgAt Gf seke kzaraRe karttari mak ni guRaH aNganizpande svede SramajavAriRi GaratyaNgamanena karaRe mak Atape grIzmakAle tayoH aNgasveda sADanatvAttaTAtvam Atapayukte divase nica GarmaSca AtapAdiva smaravikArasatvAdapi Bavati yaTAha sA da vikArAH satvasamBUtA sAtvikAH parikIrttitAH satvamAtrodBavatvAtte BinnA apyanuBAvattaH stamBaH Kedo Ta romAYcaH svaraBaNgo Ta vepaTuH vEvarRyamaSu pralaya ityazwO sAtvikAH smftAH iti viBajya vapurjalodgamaH svedo ratiGarmA SramAdiBiriti sakAraRaM svedolakzitaH yajYe niGa pitfBirGarmasadBiH f DarmasaNBiH yajYasAdiBiH BA vE vf dIptO mak vEdikaprayoge dIpte tri GarmasvarasSabde udA rase maDunaH sArasasya DarmaM pAta vasavaH yaju GarmaM rasam vedadI gavAdi nizyande dugDe pu tasya goHrakzaRAttaTAtvam DarmAya dIzva yajU he vatsa DarmAya DarmArTaM dIzya dehi payaH Sezaya mA sarvaM pAsItyarTaH vedadI rajjusaMdAnamAdAya kAtyA SrO sandAnam DarmaDugbanDanArTAya pASavatI rajjuH karkaH upayamanyAmAsiYcati Darmmam kAtyA SrO GarmyaM DarmasaMbanDi tanmaDyasTitamAjyamupayamanyAM myuci AsiYcati karkaH parIkzAByAM DarmmamutpAdya srukupuzkarasyoparyaDomuKaM karotItyarTaH saM vyA GarmasambanDi GftamupayamanyAmAsiYcati pUrvaM sruksTam nItamaDunA DarmasTaM sruci nayatItyarTaH yaju vedadI tatra nidAGakAle niHSvAsahAryaM SukamAjagAma GarmaH priyAdeSamivopadezwum raGuH UzmaRi sa vaman ruzASru GanaGarBavigaladurugaRqamaRqalaH mAGaH

Gawaparyasana na ta prAyaScitte parANmuKasya patitasya tyAgArTaM jIvata eva tasya pretakAryArTe ca jYAtiBiH kriyamARe dAsyAH pAdena kumBasya nirudakakaraRe tatadviDiH manunA darSito yaTA patitasyodakaM kAryaM sapiRqErbAnDavErbahiH nindite hani sAyAhne jYAtyftviggurusanniDO dAsI GawamapAMpUrRaM paryasyet pretavat padA ahorAtramupAsIrannaSOca bAnDavEH saha nivartteraSca tasmAttu samBAzaRasahAsane dAyAdyasya pradAnaYca yAtrA cEva hi lOkikI jyezWatA ca nivartteta jyezWAvApyaYca yadDanam jyezWAMSAM prApnuyAccAsya yavIyAn guRato DipaH patitasyeti mahApAtakino jIvata eva pretasyodakakriyA vakzyamARarItyA sapiRqEH samAnodakESca grAmAdbahirgatvA jYAtyftviggurusanniDAne riktAyAM navamyAdO tiTO dinAnte karttavyA dAsIti sapiRqasamAnodakaprayuktA dAsI udakapUrRaM GawaM pretavaditi dakziRABimuKIBUya pAdena kzipet yaTA sa nirudako Bavati tadanu te sapiRqAH samAnodakEH sahAhorAtramaSOcamAcareyuH nivartteranniti tasmAt pratitAt sapiRqAdInAM samBAzaRamekAsanopaveSanaM ca tasmE rikTadAnaM sAMvatsarikAdO nimantraRAdirUpo lokavyavahAraH etAni nivartteran jyezWateti jyezWasya yat stutyutTAnAdikaM kAryaM tattasya na kAryyaM jyezWalaByaM ca tasya viMSodDArAdikaM DanaM na deyaM yadyapi rikTapradAnapratizeDAdevApyudDArapratizeDaH sidDaH taTApi yavIyasastatprAptyarTamanUdyate tasyEva jyezWasya sambanDi DanaM sodDArASaM tadanujo guRADiko laBate kullU vistarastu mitAkzarAyAmukto yaTA yastvodDatyAdetanna cikIrzati tasya kiM kAryamityAha dAsIkumBaM bahirgrABAnninayeran svabAnDavAH patitasya bahiH kuryuH sarvakAryezu cEva tam yA jIvataeva patitasya svajYAtayo bAnDavAH mAtfpakzASca te sarve sannipatya dAsI prezyA tayA sapiRqAdiprezitayA nItaM kumBamapAmpUrRaM grAmAdbahirninayeyuH etaccaturTyAtiriktatiTizvahraH paYcame BAge gurvAdisanniDO kAryam patitasyodakaNkAryaM sapiRqErbAnDavEH saha nindite hani sAyAhne jYAtyftviggurusanniDAviti manusmaraRAt aTa vA dAsyeva sapiRqAdiprayuktA ninayet yaTAha manuH dAsI GawamapAmpUrRamparyasyet pretavattadA ahorAtramupAsIrannaSOrcabAnDavEH saheti pretavaditi dakziRA muKApasavyatvayoH prAptyarTam tacca ninayanamudakapiRqadAnAdipretakriyottarakAlaM drazwavyam tasya vidyAguruyonisambanDAMSca sannipAtya sarvARyu dakAdIni pretakarmARi kuryuH pAtraccAsya vipariziYceyurdAsaH karmakarovAvacArAtpAtramAnIya dAsI vawaM pUrayitvA dakziRAsaKI padA viparyasyedanudakamudakaNkaroti nAmagrAhAntaM sarve tvAlaBeran prAcInAvItinomuktaSiKA vidyAguravo yonisambanDASca vIkzerannapa upaspfSya grAmampraviSeyuriti gOtamasmaraRAt ayaYca tyAgo yadi banDuBiH preryamARo pi prAyaScittaM na karoti tadA drazwavyaH tasya gurorbAnDavAnAM rAjYaSca samakzandozAnaBiKyApyAnuBAvya punaH punarAcAraM laBasveti sa yadyevamapyanavasTitamatiH syAttato sya pAtraM viparyasyediti SaNKasmaraRAt tatastaM labDodakanmatitaM kalinAmAya iti tAdarTye netarANkAnAmantarBAvamuktaM vyaktIkaroti caturaNka iti tadanta rBavanti tasmin kftAye tretAdayaste antarBavanti mahAsaMKyA yAmavAntarasaMKyAntarBAvaH prasidDa iti AnandagiriH anyamatetu saMkrAntyupalakzitastAdfSasUkzmakAlEti BedaH tAdfSa sUkzmakAlasya saMkrAntiSabdArTatve saMkrAntiSabde vakzyamARadAnAdyaNgatvAsamBavena muKyABAve pratiniDiH SAstrArTaM iti nyAyena gORakAlasyApyadarttavyatA snAnA dyaNgatvAnyayAnupapattyA ca taTA kalpyatve smftyAdyuktaMkAla viSeza eva tadaNgatvena kalpAte yaToktaM kAlamADavIye snAnadAnAdyaNgaBUte saMkrAntikAle muKyakalpasyAsamBavAdanuka lpaevAdarttavyaH yaTAhaM devalaH saMkrAntisamayaH sUkzmodurjYeyaH piSitekzaREH tadyogAdapyaDaScordDaM triSaMnnAqyaH pavitritAH iti deSavyavaDAnarAhityenAtyantasaMSlizwayoH pUrbbottararASyo rmaDye sUryyaH pUrbarASiM parityajya yAvatA kAlenottararASiM praviSati sa kAlaH yogadfzwiM binA mAMsadfzwyA durllakzyaH ato nuzWAne muKyasaMkrAntikAlagrahaRAsaMBavAt saMkrAntisamba saMkrAntizu yaTA kAlastadIye pyayane taTA ayane viMSatiH pUrvA makare viMSatiH pareti makaravyatiriktEkAdaSasaMkrAntisambanDizvayanezu tattatsaM kAntivat puRyakAlo vagantavyaH makarasaMkrAntisaMmbanDini tva yane saMkrAntivElakzaRyaM tadyaTA makaraminne prAcInA viMSati zawikAH puRyAH makarasaMkrAntO tu pAScAttyA viMSatiGawikAH puRyA iti na kevalamAdityasyEva saMkrAntizvayane aDyardDanAqyaH palasapta yuktA guroScatasraH sapalASca Sukre dvinAganAqyaH palasapta yuktAH SanEScarasyABihitAH supuRyAH AdyantamaDye japahoma dAnaM kurvannavApnoti surendraDAmeti ayamarTaH Adityasya rASinakzatragamane arvAk parataSca zoqaSa GawikAH puRyakAlaH taTA candrasyApi GawikEkA palAni ca trayodaSArvAkparataSva puRyakAlaH evaM maNgalasya catasro GawikAH palamekaM ca puRyakAlaH taTA buDasya tisro GawikAScaturdaSa palAni ca puRyakAlaH vfhaspaterapi sArdDacatasro GawikAH sapna palAni ca puRyakAlaH Sukrasya catasro GawikAH palamekaYca puRyakAlaH SanEScarasya dvyaSItiGawikAH palAni ca sapna puRyakAlaH pIyUzaGArAyAM tu jEminivacanatvena etadvacanamupanyastam mezAyanAdizu saMkrAntisPuwIkaraRaYca muhUrttacintAmaRO taTA yanAMSAH KarasAhatASca spazwArkagatyA vihftAdinAdi mezA ditaH prAk calasaMkramAH syurdAne japAdO bahupuRyadAste yaTA rASisaMkramAH bahupuRya dAstaTA calasaMkramA apIti dyotanAya taTASabdaH ayanAMSAH zazWyA guRyA spazwayA sUryyagatyA vihftAH labDErdinAdyEH dinaGawIpalEH kalAM kftvA mezAdidvAdaSarASisaMkramaRakAlAt prAkcalasaMkramAScala saMkrAntayaH calasaMkramadAne brAhmaReByo dakziRAdAne japAdO japaSrAdvahomAdO bahupuRyadA Bavanti taduktaM vaSizWasidDAnte calasaMkramayuNmAse saMkramoyaH sa saMkramaH ajAgalastana iva rASisaMkrAntirucyate pulastyaH ayanAMSasaMskftoBAnurgole carati sarvadA amuKyA rASisaMkrAntistulyaH kAlaviDistayoH carmakazA sA strI carmma kaza sa ti kaza ac paScimadeSaprasidDe ganDadravyaBede cAmarakazA saptalAlatAyAM carmmakasApyatra BarataH

carmamaya tri carmaRovikAraH mayaw carmanirmite pAtrAdO striyAM NIp dvIpicarmAvanadvESca vyAGracarmamayErapi BI Ba a yaTA kAzmayo hastI yaTA carmamayo mfgaH manuH

carman na cara manin dehAvarikAyAM tvaci indriyaBede yena sparSa upalaByate tasmin Palake QAla ca tvagindriyantu vAyavIyaM yaTAha dehavyApi tvagindriyam BAzA tasya taTAtvaM si mu samarTitaM yaTA SarIra vyApakaM sparSagrAhakamindriyaM tacca vAyavIyaM rUpAdizu Bavye sparSasyEva vyaYjakatvAt aNgasaNgisalilaSEtyavyaYjaka vyajanavAtavat manasA tvagyogojYAnasAmAnye kAraRaM yaTAha tatrEva tvacoyogo manasA jYAnakAraRam tvaNmanaHsaMyogo jYAnasAmAnye kAraRamityarTaH kiM tatra pramARaM suzuptikAle tvacaM tyaktvA purItati varttamAnena manasA jYAnAjananamiti nanu suzuptikAle kiM jYAnaM Bavizyati anuBavarUpaM smaraRarUpaM vA nAdyaH anuBavasAmagryABAvAttaTAhi cAkzuzAdipratyakze cakzurAdinA saha manaHsaMyogasya hetutvAt tadaBAvAdeva na cAkzuzAdipratyakzaM jYAnAderaBAvAdeva na mAnasapratyakzaM jYAnAdyaBAve ca nAtmano pi pratyakzamiti vyAptijYAnABAvAt nAnumitiH sAdfSyajYAnABAvAt nopamitiH padajYAnABAvAt na SAbdaboDaH ityanuBavasAmagryaBAvAt nAnuBavaH udboDakABAvAcca na smaraRam mEvaM suzuptiprAkkAlotpannecCAdivyaktestatsambanDenAtmanaSca pratyakzaprasaNgAt tadatIndriyatve mAnABAvAt suzuptipAkkAle nirvikalpameka jIyata ityatrApi pramARABAvAt aTa jYAnamAtre tvaNmanaH saMyogasya yadi kAraRatvaM tadA rAsanacAkzuzAdipratyakzakAle spArSanapratyakzaM syAt vizayendriyasaMyogasya vizayatvakasaMyogasya ca tadA sattvAt parasparapratibanDAdekamapi vA na syAditi atra kecit pUrvoktayuktyA tvaNmanoyogasya hetutve sidDe cAkzuzAdisAmagryAH spArSanAdipratibanDakatvamanuBavAnuroDAt kalpyate iti anye tu suzuptyanuroDAt carmamanaHsaMyogasya jYAnahetutvaM kalpyaM vAkzuzAdipratyakzakAle tvaDi manaHsaMyogAtAvAnna syArSanapratyakzamiti vadanti carmmatvacorBeda iti tu rahasyam tvacaSca saptaviDA yaTAha suSrutaH tasya Kyalvevampravfttasya SukraSoRitasyABipacyamAnasya kzIrasyeva sAntAnikAH DArayati gavi upapade Df va gorgamAdeSaH iti tA brA BAzye mADavokteH raSmiDArake somAdityAdO ganDarvo sya rasanAmagfBnAtf ganDarvaH somaH BA UrdDe ganDarvo aDinAke asTAt f ganDarvo raSmInAM DArakaH BA vAcaM stutirUpAm DArayatIti ganDarvaH savitA vedadI gAyane viSvAvasurasi tannogfRAtu divyo ganDarvaH f divya iti viSezaRAt gAyanamAtraparatvam ata eva SabdArTaci asmin kalpe manuzyaH san puRyapAkaviSezataH ganDAtvaM samApanno martyaganDarva ucyate parvakalpakftAt puRyAt kalpAdAvasya cedBavet ganDarvatvaM tAdfSo tra divyaganDarva ucyate iti gAyanarUpaganDarvABiprAyeRa dvEviDyamuktam column3: garjja UrjjAhetukaSabde BvA zara aka sew garjjati agarjIt jagarja garjitam garjanaM garjaH garjan garjjA garja garjakzaRaM mUQeti devImAhAtmyam Saradi garjati na varzati varzati varzAsu niHsvano meGaH udBawaH kumBakarRa stato garjIt garjjan hariH sAmBasi SElakuYje BawwiH yoDAnAM cEva garjatAm BA Page b BI Slo nAma saMSrAvayAmAsa jagarja ca nanAda ca rAmA su SIlArTe cAnaS garjamAnaH taTAtra garjamAne tu meGadunduBinisvanam BA A a sanDyayAM garjite meGe SAstracintAM karoti yaH catvAri tasya naSyanti AyurvidyAyaSo balam smftiH mADAdicaturo mAsAn garjamAtraM vivarjayet smftiH anu garganapratirUpagarjane anugarjitasandigDAH karaRE rmurajasvanA kumA anurUpagarjane ca so nugarjan DanuzpARiH BA dro a aBi aBilakzya garjane saka duHSAsanastAmaBigarja mAnaH BA sa a tAcCIlye cAnaS SArdUlAviva cAnanyonyamAmizArTe ByagarjatAm BA dro a samya ggarjane aka SUrARAYcABigarjatAm BA ka a prati pratirUpagarjane aka valavaccApi saMkrudDAvanyonyaM pratigarjatAm BA vi a ArzaH padavyatyayaH pratIpaM patato mattAn kuYjarAn pratigarjataH BA u a suhfdayohfdayaH pratigarjatAm raGuH pratilakzyIkftya garjane saka fzIRAM kadanaM kftvA nAmapi pratigarjati harivaM a garjja rave curA uBa aka sew garjjayati te ajaga rjat ta garjayAM baBUba Asa cakAra cakre garjayat garjayamAnaH

column2: iBAnana pu iBasyAmanamevAnanaM yasya gajAnane gaReSe tasya yaTA tadAnanatvaM taToktaM svayaM golakanATaSca puRyakasya praBAvataH pArvatIgarBajAtaSca tava putro Bavizyati svayaM devagaRAnAYca yasmAdISaH kfpAniDiH gaReSa iti viKyAto Bavizyati jagatraye SanidfzwyA SiracCedAt gajavaktreRa yojita gajAnanaH SiSustena niyatiH kena bADyate brahmavE pu a SanidfzwyA tacCiracCedakaTA tatrEva a pArvvatIvacanaM SrutvA so numena hfdA svayam paSyAmi kiM na paSyAmi pArvvatIsutamityaho yadi bAlo mayA vfzwastasya niGno Baved Druvam anyaTA me pralApastatparataH svAtmAmaraRam ityAlocya ca DarmizWo DarmaM kftvA svasAkziRam bAlaM drazwaM manaScakre na bAlamAtaraM SaniH vizaRamAnasaH pUrvaM SuzkakaRWIzWatAlukaH savyalocanakoRena dadarSa ca SiSormuKam SaniSca dfzwimAtreRa cicCeda mastakaM mune cakzurnivArayAmAsa tasTO namrAnanaH SaniH evaM SiraSCedamuktvA tAn sarvvAn mUrcCitAn dfzwvA cAruhya garuqaM hariH jagAma puzpaBadrAM sa uttarasyAM diSi sTitAm puzpaBadrAnadItIre dadarSa kAnanasTitam gajendraM nidritaM tatra SayAnaM hastinoyutam diSyuttarasyAM SirasaM mUrcCitaM surataSramAt paritaH SAvakAn kftvA paramAnandmAnasam SIGraM sudarSanenEva cicCeda tacCiro mudA sTApayAmAsa garuqe ruGirAktaM manoharam gajaSiraSCedamuktvA tatpatnayA stutena hariRA tasya kalpAntajIvanaM varodatta ityupavarRya Agatya bAlakasyAnaM bAlaM kftvA Ta vakzasi ruciraM tacCiraH kftvA yojayAmAsa bAlake brahmasvarUyI BagavAn brahmajYAnena lIlayA jIvanaM yojayABAsa huNkAroccAraRena ca pArvvatIM boDayitvA tu dattvA kroqe ca taM SiSum boDayAmAsa tAM nATa ADyAtmikaviboDanEH senAcarIBavadiBAnanadAnavArivAsena yasya janitAsuraBIraRaSrIH nEza iBavaktreBamuKagajAnanAdayo pyatra taM namAmi gajAnanam mADavaH

column2: jIrRAsTimfttikA strI kftrimamfttikABede aTa vakzye tu jIrRAsTimfttikAkaraRaM priye SilAjatusTale kuryAd dIrGaM garttaM manoharam niHkzipet tatra nAnAsTisaYcayaMdvicatuzpadAm sarjikzAraM mahAkzAraM mftkzAraM lavaRAni ca ganDakozRajalaM kzepyaM nAnAmUtrARi tatra ca evaM kftvA mAsazawkaM dadyAt pAzARamfttikAm kaNkAsTyUrdDvaM tadUrdDvantu kuryAdvahnIzwakAM SuBAm trivarzAjjAyate sarvamekIBUtaM dfzatsamam tato nizkAsya taccUrRaM kftvA pAtrARi nirmamet praSastaM BojanaM tatra sUcayedannadUzaRam mahAvizasya saMyogAt tasya BaNgaH prajAyate dUzivizAdisaMyogAt pAtre sPowA Bavanti hi tatra kziptaM kzudravizaM pAtraM kfzRaM prajAyate evaM jYAtvA tatra dadyAnna kadAcidvizAdikamiti rAvaRaH SabdArTacintAmaRiH

jIrRodDAra pu jIrRasya pUrvapratizWApitaliNgAderudDAraH pUrvapratizWApitaliNgAdeH BagnatAdO svasTAnAdudDAre tadviDAnam agnipu a uktaM yaTA BagavAn uvAca jIrRodDArabiDiM vakzye BUzitAM snapayed guruH acalAM binyased gehe atijIrRAM pari tyajet vyaNgAM BagnAM ca SElAQyAM nyasedanyAM ca pUrva vat saMhAraviDinA tatra tattvAn saMhftya deSikaH sahasraM narasihena hutvA tAmudDared guruH dArabIM dAhaye dvahnO SElajAM prakzipejjale DAtujAM ratnajAM vApi agataDe vA jale mbuDO yAnamAropya jIrRANgaM CAdya vastrA dinA nayet vAditrEH prakzipettoye gurave dakziRAM dadet yatpramARA ca yaddravyA tanmAnAM sTApayet punaH kUpa vApItaqAgAderjIrRodDAre mahAPalam ni si viSezo yaTA aTa jIrRodDAraH sa ca liNgAdO dagDe Bagne calite vA kAryyaH ayaM cAnAdisidDapratizWitaliNgAdO BaNgA diduzwe pi na kAryaH tatra tu mahABizekaM kuryyAditi trivikramaH karttA mukadevasya jIrRodDAraM karizye ityuktvA puRyAhaM vAcayitvA AcAryyamftvijaSca vftvA liNge oM vyApakeSvarahfdayAya namaH oM vyApakeSvaraSirase svAhetyevaM zaqaNgaM kftvA GoramantraM SataM japtvA gniM pratizWApyADoreRa GftasarzapEH sahasraM hutvA indrAdiByo nAmnA valiM dattvA jIrRadevaM praRavena saMpUjya brahmAdi maRqaladevatAnAM homaM pUrvoktaM kftvA devaM prArTayeta jIrRaBagnamidaM cEva sarvadozAvahaM nfRAm asyodDAre kfte SAntiH SAstre smin kaTitA tvayA jIrRodDAra viDAnaYca nfparAzwrahitAvaham tadaDastizWatAM deva praha rAmi tavAjYayeti tataH kzIrAjyamaDudUrvABiH samidBiScA zwottarasahasraM SataM vA devamantreRa hutvA NgAnAM daSAMSena liNgacAlanArTaM sahasraM SataM vA pAyasena hutvA liNgaM prArTayeta liNgarUpaM samAtatya yenedaM samaDizWitam yAyAstvaM saMmitaM sTAnaM santyajyEva SivAjYayA atra sTAne ca yA vidyA sarvavidyESvarEryutA Sivena saha saMtizWeti mantritajalenABizicya visarjayet tato stra mantritena svanitreRa KAtvA liNgamAnIya nadyAdO vAma devena liNgaM praRavena mUrttiM kzipet dArujantu maDunA ByajyADoreRa dahet hemaratnAdimayantu dagDaM calitaM Page a vA punastatrEva sTApayeta tataH SAntyE aGoreRa tilEH sahasraM hutvA prArTayeta BagaMvAn BUtaBavyeSa loka nATa jagatpate jIrRaliNgasamudDAraH kftastavAjYayA mayA agninA dArujaM dagDaM kziptaM SElAdikaM jale prAyaScittAya deveSa aGorAstreRa tarpitam jYAna to jYAnato vApi yaToktaM na kftaM yadi tatsarvaM pUrRamevAstu tvatprasAdAnmaheSvareti tato yajamAnaH pArTayeta govipraSilpiBUtAnAmAcAryyasya ca yajvanaH SAntirBavatu deveSa acCidraM jAyatAmidam mUrttO tu viSezaH tvatprasAdena nirviDnaM dehaM nirmApa yatyasO vAsaM kuru suraSrezWa tAvattvaM cAlpake gfhe vasan kleSaM sahitveha murttiM vE tava pUrbavat yAvat kArayet BaktaH kuru tasya ca vAYCitamiti tato navAM mUrttiM liNgaM vA kftvoktaviDinA sTAzayet BagnamandirAdeH saMskAre ca sa ca vizRuDarmottare tftIya kARqe ukto yaTA yasya rAjYastu vizaye devaveSma viSI ryyate tasya sIdati tadrAjyaM devaveSma yaTA taTA kftvA jIrRasya saMskAraM taTA deveSaveSmani dviguRaM PalamApnoti nAtraM kArTyA vicAraRA vizRurahasye patitasya ca yaH karttA patamAnasya rakzitA vizRorA yatanasyeha sa naro vizRulokaBAk agnipurARe patitaM patamAnantu tadArdDasPuwitaM naraH samudDftya harerDAma dviguRaM PalamApnuyAt devIpurARe mUlA cCataguRaM puRyaM prApnuyAjjorRakArakaH tasmAt sarva prayatnena jIrRasyodDAramAcaret hayaSIrzapaYcarAtre vApIkUpataqAgAnAM suraDAmnAM taTAnaGa pratimAnAM samAnAYca saMskarttA yo naro Buvi puRyaM SataguRaM tasya BavenmUlAnna saMSayaH pratizWAyA viDiH kAryya staTA mandiranirmite prAyaH SrIhayaSIrzokteranusAreRa vEzRavEH devAlayapratizWA ca KyAtA talliKanena kim SrImUrttisTApanenEvaM saMpUrRA sA viSezataH devagfhaM devatAyAH pratizWAviDinA sadA saMskAyyaM manujA nAntu samudAyo sya karmmaRA hariBakti vilAsaH

column2: jvarANguSarasa pu jvarsaya jvarasyagajarUpasya aNkuSa iva pratiroDakatvAt karma BEzajyara ukte OzaDaBede sa ca nAnAviDo yaTA SudDaM sUtaM vizaM ganDaM DUrttabIjaM triBiH samam caturRAM dviguRaM vyozaM cUrRaM guYjAdvayaM hitam jambIrasya ca majjABirArdrakasya rasEryutam jvarANkuSo raso nAmnA jvarAn sarvAn nihanti vE vyozaM milityA dvigum ayaM Bedi jvarANkuSo nAmnA KyAtaH anyo pi tatrEva ukto yaTA rasasya dviguRaM ganDaM ganDatulyaYca waNkanam rasatulyaM vizaM yojyaM maricaM paYcaDA vizAt kawPalaM dantibIjaYca pratyekaM mariconmitam jvarANkuSo rasohyez cUrRayedaticikkaRam mAzEkena nihantyASu jvaraM jIrRaM tridozajam atrAnurapamAtrAM SarkarAdInAM nipIya gilitvA kiYcijjalaM pibet anyaviDo pi tatrEvokto yaTA tAmrakAd dviguRaM tAlaM mardayet suzavIdravEH prapuwed BUDare SIte vajrIkzIreRa mardayet prapuwet BUDare paScAt paYcaguYcAmitaM Bavet Ardrakasya rasenEva sarvajvaranikfntanaH EkAhikam dravyAhikaYca tryAhikaM cAturAhikam vizamaYcApi SItAdyaM jvaraM hanti jvarANkuSaH anyaviDo pi tatrEva SudDasUtaM taTA ganDaM karzamAnaM nayedbuDaH mahOzaDaM waNkanaYca haritAlaM taTA vizam rasArdDaM mardayet Kalle BfNgarAjarasena tu tridinaM BAvanAM dattvA caturTe vawikAM tataH kuryAccaRakamAtrAYca pizmalImaDusaMyutAm eza jvarANkuSo nAma vizamajvaranASanaH mahOzaDAdInAM caturRAM pratyekaM rasArdDam anyaviDo pi maricaM waNkanaM SaNkacUrRaM pAradaganDakam SoDitaM brahmaputraYca BAgamekaM viniHkzipet guYjAmAtrA pradAtavyA nAgavallIdalEH maha jvarANkuSo rasohyeza jvaramazwaviDaM jayet anyaviDo pi triBAgatAlena hataYca tAmraM rasaYca ganDaYca samonamAyuH vizaM samaM taddviguRaYca tAmraM trisaptavAraYca divAkarAtape saMmardya nimbusvarasena cUrRaM guYjApramARaM sitayA sametam jvarANkuSo yaM viviDapramAvo jvaraM nihantyazwaviDaM samagram BInamAyuH matsyapittam

column3: jvarANkuSarasa pu jvarasya gajarUpasya aNkuSa iva prati roDakatvAt karmma BEzajyara ukte OzaDaBede sa ca nAnAviDo yaTA SudDaM sUtaM vizaM ganDaM DUrttavIjaM triBiH samam caturRAM dviguRaM byozaM cUrRaM guYjAdvayaM hitam jambIrasya ca majjABirArdrakasya rasEryutam jvarANkuSo rasI nAmnA jvarAn sarvAn nihanti vE vyozaM militvA dviguRam ayaM Bedi jvarANku So nAmnA KyAtaH anyo pi tatrEva ukto yaTA rasasya dviguRaM ganDaM ganDa tulyaYca waNkanam rasatulyaM vizaM yojyaM maricaM paYcaDA vizAt kawPalaM dantivIjaYca pratyekaM mariconmitam jvarANkuSo rasohyeza cUrRayedaticikkaRam mAzEkena nihantyASu jvaraM jIrRaM tridozajam atrAnurUpamAtrAM SarkarAdInAM nipIya gilitvA kiYcijjalaM pivet anyaviDo pi tatrEvokto yaTA tAmrakAd dviguRaM tAlaM mardayet suzavIdravEH prapuwed BUDare SIte vajrIkzIreRa mardayet prapuwet BUDare paScAt praYcaguYjAmitaM Bavet Ardrakasya rasenEva sarvajvaranikf ntanaH EkAhikam dvyAhikaYca tryAhikaM cAturA hikam vizamaYcApi SItAdyaM jvaraM hanti jvarANkuSaH anyaviDo pi tatrEva SudDasUtaM taTA ganDaM karzamAnaM nayed buGaH mahOzaDaM waNkanaYca haritAlaM taTA vizam rasArdDaM mardayet Kalle BfNgarAjarasena tu tridinaM BA vanAM dattvA caturTe vawikAM tataH kuryyAccaRakamAtrAYca pippalImaDusamyutAm eza jvarANkuSo nAma vizama Page a jvaranASanaH mahOzaDAdInAm caturRAM pratyekaM rasA rdDam anyaviDo pi maricaM waNkanaM SaNGacUrRaM pAradaga nDakam SoDitaM brahmaputraYca BAgamekaM viniHkzipet guYjAmAtrA pradAtavyA nAgavallIdalEH saha jvarANkuSo rasohyeza jvaramazwaviDaM jayet anyaviDo pi tri BAgatAlena hataYca tAmraM rasaYca ganDaYca samonamAyuH vizaM samaM tadudviguRaYca tAmraM trisaptavAraYca divAkarAtape saMmardya nimbusvarasena cUrRaM guYjApramARaM sitayA same tam jvarANkuSo yaM vibiDapraBAvo jvaraM nihantyazwaviDaM samagram mInamAyuH matsyapittam

column3: kapotalubDakIya na kapotaM lubDakaYcADikftya kfto granTaH dvandvAcCaH pA Ca BAratAntargate gfhasTasya prARadAne nApyAtiTyAvaSyakarttavyatAsUcake AKyAyikABede tatkaTA BA SA a sa patnyA vacanaM SrutvA DarmmaM yuktisamanvitam harzeRa mahatA yukto bAkyavyAkulalocanaH taM vE SAkunikaM dfzwvA viDidfzwena karmaRA sa pakzI pUjayAmAsa yatnAttaM pakzijIvinam uvAca svAgataM te dya brUhi kiM kara vARi te santApaSca na karttavyaH svagfhe varttate BavAn tadvratItu BavAn kzipraM kiM karomi kimicCasi praRa yena bravImi KAM tvaM hi naH SaraRAgataH arAvapyuci taM kAryyamAtiTyaM gfhamAgate CettumapyAgate CAyAM nopasaMharate drumaH SaraRAgatasya karttavyamAtiTyaM hi prayatnataH paYcayajYapravfttena gfhasyena viSezataH paYca yajYAMstu yo mIhAnna karoti gfhASraye tasya nAyaM na ca paro loko Bavati DarmmataH tadbrUhi mAM suvi SrabDo TattvaM vAcA yadizyasi tat karizyAmyahaM sarvaM Page b mA tvaM Soke manaH kfTAH tasya tadvacanaM SrutvA Sakune rlubDako bravIt bADate Kalu me SItaM santrARaM hi viDIyatAm evamuktastataH pakzI parRAnyAstIryya BUtale yaTASaktyA hi parRena jvalanArTaM drutaM yayO gatvA NgArakakarmAntaM gfhItvA gnimaTAgamat tataH Suzkezu parRezu pAvakaM so pyadIpayat sa saMdIptaM mahat kftvA tamAha SaraRAgatam pratApaya suviSrabDaH svagAtrARyakuto BayaH sa taToktastaTetyuktvA lubDo gAtrARyatApayat agnipratyAgataprARastataHprAha vihaNgamam harzeRa mahatA vizwo vAkyaM vyAkulalocanaH taTemaM SakuniM dfzwvA viDi dfzwena karmmaRA dattamAhAramicCAmi tvayA kzudbADate hi mAm sa tadvacaH pratiSrutya vAkyamAha vihaNgamaH na me sti viBavo yena nASayeyaM kzuDAntava utpannena hi jIvAmo vayaM nityaM vanOkasaH saYcayo nAsti cAsmAkaM munInAmiva Bojane ityuktvA taM tadA tatra vivarRavadano Bavat kaTaM nu Kalu karttavyamiti cintA parastadA vaBUva BarataSrezWa garhayan vfttimAtmanaH mUhUrttAllabDasaMjYastu sa pakzI pakziGAtinam ubAca tarpayizye tvAM muhUrttaM pratipAlaya ityuktvA SuzkaparREstu samujjvAlya hutASanam harzeRa mahatA vizwaH sa pakzI vAkyamabravIt fzIRAM devatAnAYca pitFRAYca mahA tmanAm SrutaH pUrbbaM mayA Darmmo mahAnatiTipUjane kuruzvAnugrahaM sOmya satyametabradvImi te niScitA Kalu me budDiratiTipratipUjane tataH kftapratijYo vE pakzI prahasanniva Bavi zyati na saMSayaH evaM bahuviDaM sUri vilalApa sa luvDakaH garhayan svAni karmARi dvijaM dfzwvA taTAgatam

karRAww na karRaH tiryagreKAkAravAn ivAwwam gfhaBede tanniruktilakzaRam biBiduste maRistamBAn karRAwwaSiKa rARi ca BA va a SlokavyAKyAyAM nIlakaRWenoktaM yaTA karRastiryagyAnaM tena prakA reRa yatpAzARAdivistareRa kriyate tattadgfhaviSezaM ka rRAwwamiti vadantitadDi dikkoRasya caturasrasyopari vidikkoRa caturasraM taduparidikkoRaM tadupari punarvidikvoRamityevaM kra meRottarottaramalpapramAREScaturasrEH samApyam iti prasi dDam tatra karRAweti pAWaH prAmAdikaH nIlakaRWena ka rRAwwapadasyEva vyAKyAnAt

column2: karRAwwa na karRaH tiryagreKAkAravAn ivAwwam gfhaBede tanniruktilakzaRam viBiduste maRistamBAn karRAwwaSiKarARi ca BA va a SlokavyAKyAyAM nIlakaRWenoktaM yaTA karRastiryagyAnaM tena prakAreRa yatpAzARAdivistareRa kriyate tattadgfhaviSezaM karRAwwamiti vadanti tadvidikkoRasya caturasrasyopari vidikkoRa caturasraM taduparidikkoRaM tadupari punarvidikoRamityevaM krameRottarottaramalpapramARE ScaturasrEH samApyam iti prasidDam tatra karRAweti pAWaH prAmAdikaH nIlakaRWena karRAwwapadasyEva vyAKyAnAt
karRImat pu karRirvARaviSezAkAraH Pale styasya matup saMjYAyAM dIrGaH AragyaDe sodAla Sabdaci

karRIraTa pu karRaH sAmIpyenAstyasya karRI skanDaH tena I SoBA yasya na samAsAntaH kap sa cAsO raTo raTatulyaM vAhanaM karmma skanDavAhye yAne pAlaMkI ityAdO Sabdaci tu anyA vyutpattirdarSitA yaTA karRasADyakriyA upacArAt GarRaH karRo syAsti ini karRI cAsO raTaSca SabdamAtreRa raTo na vastuto raTaH yadvA sAmIpyAt karRaSabdena skanDo lakzyate so syAsti vAhanatvena ini karRI cAsO raTaSca uBayatra anyezAmapIti pA dIrGaH iti karRIraTasTAM raGuvIrapatnIm raGuH

karRIsuta pu ta mUladeve trikA hArA ca sa ca kaMsAsuraH iti SabdakalpadrumaH tanmUlaM mfgyaM kaMsasya karRImAtfkacABAvAt kAda wIkAyAmuktasteyaSAstrapravarttakamUladevasyEva tannAma na tu ugrasenajasya nAma ataeva karRIsutakaTeva sannihitavipulAcalA kAda a karRIsutaH karawakaH steyaSAstrapravarttakaH tasya ravyAtO saKAyO dvO vipulAcalasaMjYakO wI uktam karRIsutaprahite ca paTi matimakavaram daSaku

karRRa Bedane adantacurAdi uBa saka sew karRRayati te acakarRat ta karRRayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre karRRayitA karRRayizyati karRanam karRRaH karRRitaH karRRayitum karRRayan karRayamAnaH karRayitvA AkarRya karRRI karRyate akarRRi akarRRizAtAm akarRayizAtAm A karRRa SravaRe AkarRayannutsukahaMsanAdAn BawwiH miTastadAkarRanasajjakarRayA devAkarRaya suSrutena caraka syoktena jAne svilam adastadA karRRiPalAQyajIvi Page b lam iti ca nEza AkarRya samprati rutaM caraRAyuDA nAm sA da

karRRagataroga pu karRRe gatIrogaH suSrutokte karRRagate ro gaBede tadBedanidAnAdi tatrEvoktaM yaTA aTAtaH karRagatarogavijYAnIyamaDyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH karRaSUlaM praRAdaSca bADiryyaM kzpeqa eva ca karRasrAvaH karRakaRqUH karRagUTa staTEva ca kfmi karRapratInAhO vidraDi dviviDa staTA karRapAkaH pUtikarRa staTEvArSaScaturvviGam taTArvvudaM saptavaDaM SoTaScApi caturviDaH ete karRagatArogA azwAviMSatirIritAH samIraRaH Srotragato nyaTAcaraH samantataH SUlamatIva karRayoH karoti dozESca yaDAsvamAvftaH sa karRaSUlaH kaTito durAcaraH yadA tu nAqIz vimArgamAgataH sa eva SabdABivahAsu tizWati SfRoti SabdAn viviDAMstadA naraH praRAda BenaM kaTavanti cAmavam sa eva SabdA BivahA yadA sirAH kaPAnuyAto pyanusfvya ti zWati tadA narasyApratikArasevino Bavettu bADiryya masaMSayaM Kalu SramAtkzatAdrUkzakazAyanojanAt samI raRaH SabdapaTe vyavasTitaH viriktaSIrzasya ca SIta sebinaH karoti hi kzveqa matIva karRayoH Siro BiGAtAdaya vA nimajjato jale prapAkAdaTavApi vi draDeH sravettu pUyaM SravaRo nilAvftaH sakarRasaMsrAva iti prakIrttitaH kaPena kaRqUH pracite Ta karRayo rBfSaM Bavet srotasi karRa saMjYite viSozite SlezmaRi pittatejasA nfRAM Bavet srotasi karRagUTakaH sa ka rRagUTo dravatAM yadAgato vilAyito GrARamuKaM prapadyate tadA sa karRapratinAhasaMjYito BavedvikAraH Siraso ti tApanaH yadA tu mUrcCantyaTa vApi jantavaH sfjantya patyAnyaTavApi makzikAH tadaYjanatvAcCravaRo nirucyate BizagnirAdyEH kfmikarRakastu saH kzatABizAtapraBavastu vidraDi rBavettaTA dozakfto TavA punaH sa raktapItA ruRamasramAsvanetpratodaDUmAyanadAhapsozavAna BavetpapAkaH Kalu pittakopato vikozavikladakaraSca kaREyoH Page b sTite kaPe snotasi pittatejasA vilApyamAne BfSasa mpratApanAt avedano vApyaTavA savedano GanaM sravetpUti sapUtikarRakaH pradizwaliNgAnyarSAMsi tattvatastaTEva SoTA rbbuda liNga mIri tam mayA purastAtprasamIkzya yojayedihEva tAni prayato BizagvaraH

karRRasPowA strI karRe sPowo vidAraRaM yasyAH kARa PAwA latABede rAjani karRRasPowA kawustiktA himA ca parikIrttitA sarvvagrahaBUtavizadozavyADi vinASinI rAjani

karRRasrotas na karRasya srota iva karmmamale

karRRasrotoBava pu karRasrotaso vizRukarRamalAdBavati BU ac BavatyasmAt apAdAne ap karRasroto Bavoyasya vA vizRukarRamalodBUte maDunAmake kEwaBanaHmake cAsure karRasroto BavaYcApi maDuM nAma mahAsuram tamugramu grakarmmARamugrAM budDiM samAsTitam brahmaRo pacitiM kurvvan jaGAna puruzottamaH BA anu a yaTAcAsya vizRukarRAdudBavaH taTA kEwaBaSabde vakzyate

karRRavaMSa pu karRRaH karRRAkArovaMSoyatra maYce hArA tasya pAdezu baMSAkAratvAttaTAtvam
karRRavarjjita tri ta baDire kAlA SrotraSUnye sarpe pu strI Sabdaca striyAM jAtO NIz tasya cakzuHSravastvAttaTAtvam bADiryaYca SravaRaSaktiSUnyatvam

karRRaveDa pu viDa GaY ta SAstroktaviDAnena karRRa yorveDane tatprakAramuhUrttAdikaM muhUrttacintAmaRipIyU zaDArayorukta yaTA hitva tAMScEtrapOzAvaTa hariSayanaM janmamAsaMca riktAM yugamAvadaM karRRavezwa pu karRI vezwyete anena kuRqale kroDavaSA surAMSe dvAparayugIyanfpaBede ca gaRaH kroDavaSonAma yaste rAjan prakIrttitaH tataH saMjajYire vIrAH kzitAviha narADipAH mardakaH karRRavezwaSca sidDArTaH kIcakastaTA BA A a Rvul karRavezwako trEva karRRavezwakAya hitam Ca yat vA karRRavezwakIya karRRavezwakya tadDite suvarRRAdO tri BAve lyuzw karRa vezwana karRaBUzaRe na karaRe lyuw kuRqale amaraH tataH tAByAM sampAdI Wak kArRRavezwakika kArRRavezwanika karRa vazwana ke na SoBamAne tri kArRavezwanikaM muKam BawwiH
karRRaviz strI karRRasya viw karRRamale kAReraKala vasA SukramasfNmajjAmUtraviqDrARakarRRaviw SlezmASrudUzi kAsvedo dvAdarSate nfRAM malAH manuH SoDayet karRRaviwkantu Bizak samyak SalAkayA suSru

karRRendu pu karRe induriva ardDacandrAkftikarRAlaNkAraBede Sabdara

karRRikA strI karRa Rvul karRe BavaH alaNkAraH ikan ata ittvam karRABaraRaBede kAR kariSuRqAgrava rttinyaNgulAkAre padArye padmavIjakoze ca amaraH yasyAmavasTitaH sarvvataH sOvarRaH kulagirirAjomerurdvIpA yAmasamunnAhaH karRikABUtaH BAga kramu kAdivfntaparamparAyAm CaqA karamaDyANgulO ca medi leKanyAM hArA agnimanTavfkze a jaSfNgIvfkze ca rAjani karRRo vfdDo styasya Wan vfdDa karRe tri
karRRikAcala pu karRikAyAM sTito cala sumeruparvate hemaca yaTA cAsya tayArUpeRa sTiti taTA karRikA Sabde BAga Slo uktaM tacca karRikASabde uktam karRikAparvatAdayo nyatra

karRRikAra pu karRiM BedanaM karoti kf aR upa sa gaRiyArI vfkzaBede AragbaDavfkzaBede ca Cowa sondAla SoDanarUpamalaBedakatvAt tayoH taTAtvam karRikAraH parivyADaH zAdapotpalaH ityapi karRikAraH kawustiktastuvaraH SoDano laGuH raYjanaH suKadaH So TaSlezmAsravraRakuzWanut BAvapra guRAdi uktam zarRaprakarze sati karRikAraM dunoti nirganDatayA sma cetaH kumA anantaraYca kaScit karRika ragOraH daSaku

column3: karRa pu karRyate AkarRyate nena karRa karaRe ac kIryyante SabdA vAyunA tra kF nan vA Srotre Sabda jYAnasADane indriyaBede tadADAre golake ca SrotraYca karRRaSazukalyavacCinnanaBorUpamiti nEyAyikAdayaH sAtvikAkASasUkzmAMSa iti vedAntinaH sAMKyAdayaSca svIcakruH tatrAdyamate SabdotpattideSe Srotrasya gama nABAvena anyatrotpannaSabdagrahaRAsamBavaH taTA hi AkASasyEkatve pi upADiBedena BedAt yadIyakarRa SazkulIpradeSe SabdasamavAyastasyEva SrAvaRam nAnyasya tataSca vIcitaraNganyAyena kadambakorakakanyAyena vA SabdotpattAvapi SabdotpattideSasya SrotuSca viBinnadeSasTatayA na Sabdopa labDiH syAt atastattaddeSasTasya SIGraM DAvamAnasya vA yoH saMyogaviBAgAdayaH SrotuH SabdAdaBivyaYjakAH tadetat SaNkApUrvvakam mImAMsABAzye samarTitam yaTA yadi SabdaM saMyogaviBAgA evABivyaYjanti na kurvvanti AkASavizayatvAcCabdasya AkASasyEkatvAt ya evAparatra SrotrAkASaH sa eva deSAntarezvapIti sruGna syEH saMyogaviBAgEraBivyaktaH pAwakiputre pyupalaByeta yasya punaH kurvvanti tasya vAyavIyAH saMyogaviBAgA vAyvASritatvAdvAyuzveva karizyanti yaTA tantavaH tantu zveva pawaM tasya pAwaliputrezvanupalalamBI yuktaH sruGnasTa tvAttezAm yasyApyaBivyaYjanti tasyApyeza na dozaH dUre satyAH karRaSazkalyAH anupakArakAH saMyogaviBAgAH tena dUre yacCrotraM tena nopalamyate iti nEdadevaM aprAptAScet saMyogaviBAgAH SrotrasyopakuryuH sannikfzwavipra kfzwadeSasTO yugapacCabdamupalaBeyAtAm na ca yugapadupala Bete tasmAnnAprAptAH upakurvanti na cedupakurvanti tasmAdanimittaM SabdopalamBane saMyogaviBAgO iti nEtadevaM aBiGAtena hi preritAH vAyavastimitAni vAyva ntarARi pratibADamAnAH sarvyatodikkAn saMyogaviBAgAn utpAdayanti yAvadvegamaBipratizWante te ca saMyo gaviBAgAH vAyorapratyakzatvAt nopalaByante anu paratezveva tezu SabdaH upalaByate noparatezu ato na dozaH ata eva cAnuvAtaM dUrAdupalaByate SabdaH vedAntyAdimate Sabdasya paYcamUtaguRatayA SabdADAraM vAyunA Jawiti kaRRadeSe yaTAvegaM DAvamAnena karRRaprApaRasamBava Page a stena SabdopalamBaH tanmate SravaRendriyasya prApyakAri tvoktirapyetatpareti boDyam karRRasyAvizWAtfdevaSca dik iti karaRADizaSabde uktam karRRagrAhyASca SabdAstadBedAstadDarmmASca karRRekftaM kanaka patramanAlapantyA cogapa miTastadAkarRa nasajjakarRayA nEza tadguREH karRRamAgatya cApalAya praRoditaH raGuH SravaRendriyasya sUkzmatve pi tadADArABiprAyeRa avalambita karRaSazkulIkalasIkaM racayannavocata nEza vAkyam suvarRRAlIvfkze medi trikoRAdikzetre Bujakowi saMyojakareKABede tadreKAmAnajYAnopAyaSca lIlA uktaH yaTA izwAdbAho yaH syAttatspardDinyAM diSItarobAhuH tryasre caturasre vA sA kowiH kIrttitA tajjYEH tat kftyoryogapadaM karRRo doHkarRRavargayorvivarAt mUlaM kowiH kowiSrutikftyorantarAt padaM bAhuH iti udA diNmAtra matrocyate BujaH kowiH anayorvargaH tayo ryogaH tasya mUlam taTAca caturhastabAhuke triha stakowike kzetre karRRamAnam paYca hastAH aDikaM kzetravyavahAraSabde vakzyate asya ca BujakowiBedanAt kfti dvArA tayorvargavyApanAccakarRRatvam kuwile ca vyAGAra Ravat prARaBftaH karRasahitAH kAtyA karRRena akzRayA sahitAH saMgra vyA akzRayA kOwilyena iti kAtyA sU vyA karkaH kuntyAH kanyAvasTAyAM sUryyAt jAte svanAmaKyAte vasuzeRe tadutpattikaTA yaTA SUronAma yaduSrezwovamudevapitA Bavat tasya kanyA pfTA nAma rUpeRAsadfSI Buvi pituH svasrIyaputrAya so napa tyAya vIryavAn agramagra pratijYAya svasyApatyasya vEtadA agrajAteti tAM kanyAM SUro nugrahakANkzayA adadat kuntiBojAya sa tAM duhitaraM tadA sA niyuktA piturgeha brAhmaRAtiTipUjane ugramparyyacaradGoraM brAhmaRaM Sa si tavratam nigUQaniScayaM DarmavantaM durvAsasaM viduH tamugraM SaMsitAtmAnaM sarvayatnEratozayat tuzwo BicArasaMyuktamAca cakze yaTAviDi uvAcacEnAM BagavAn prIto smi suBage tava yaM yaM devaM tvametena mantreRAvAhayizyasi tasya tasya prasA dAttva devi putrAn janizyasi evamuktA ca sA bAlA tadA kOtUhalAnvitA kanyA satI devamarkamAjuhAva yaSasvinI prakASakarttA BagavAMstasyAM garBaM daGO tadA ajIjanat sutaM tasyAM sarvaSastraBftAMparam sakuRqalaM sakavacaM devagarBaM SriyA nvitam divAkarasamaM dAptyA cArusaMrvANgaBUzitam nigUha Page b mAnA jAtaM vE banDupakzaBayAt tadA utsasarja jale kuntI taNkumAraM yaSasvinam tamutsfzwaM jale garBaM rADABarttA ma hAyaSAH rADAyAH kalpayAmAsa putraM so DiraTistadA cakraturnnAmaDeyaYca tasya bAlasya tAvuBO dampatI vasuzeReti dikzu sarvAKu viSrutam sa vardDamAno balavAn sarvAstrezUttamo Bavat vedANgAni ca sarvARi samApa jayatAMvaraH yasmin kAle japannAste GImAn satyaparAkramaH nAdeyaM brAhmaRe zvAsIttasmin kAle mahAtmanaH tamindro brAhmaRoBUtvA pu trArTeBUtaBAvanaH yayAce kuRqale vIraM kavacaYca sahANgajam utkftya karRohyadadat kavacaM kuRqale taTA SaktiM Sakro dadO tasmE vismitaScedamabravIt devAsuramanuzyARAM ganDarvo ragarakzasAm yasmin kzepsyasi durdDarva sa ekona Bavizyati zurA nAma ca tasyAsIdvasuzeRa iti kzitO tato vEkarttanaH karRaH karmaRA tena so Bavat AmuktakavacovIroyastu jajYe mahAyaSAH sa karRa iti viKyAtaH pfTAyAH praTamaH sutaH sa tu sUtakule vIro vavfDe rAjasattama karRaM naranaraSrezWaM sarvaSastraBftAM varam duryoDanasya sacivaM mitraM SatruvinA Sanam divAkarasya taM vidDi rAjannaM Samanuttamam tasyANgadeSAzipatAprAptiH aNgADipaSabde uktA karRo styasya prASastyena arSa ac lambakarRe tri KaqgovE SvadevaH SvA kfzRaH karRRogardaBaH yaju karRRo la mvakarRRaH vedadI aritre ca pu karRaH Srotramaritra Yceti durgaH karRRaDAraH hatakarRReva nOrjale rAmA

column2: karRaBUzaRa na karRaM BUzayati BUza lyu karRABaraRe amaraH

karRaDAra pu karRamaritraM DArayati f aR upa sa nAvike mAjI amaraH akarRaDArA jalaDO viplaveteha nOriva hito sAhityArRavakarRaDAreti sA da duHKAdinivArake tri akarRaDArA pfTivI SUnyeva pratiBAti me gate daSaraTe svargaM rAme ca raRyamASrite rAmA
karRaPala karRaH PalamivAsya matsyaBede kARalimACa rAjani
karRaSUla na ta karRarogaBede karRagatarogaSabde vivftiH
karRaSazkulI strI karRasya SazkulIva karRagolake avalambitakarRaSazkulIkalasIkaM racayannavocata nEza karRaSazkatyavacCinnaM naBaH Srotram muktA tanmaDyAkASe ca
karRaSoBana tri karRaM SoBayati SuBa Ric lyu karRABaraRe uta naH karRaSoBanA purURi f
karRaSrava tri SrUyate SravaH SabdaH karRena SravaH SravaRayogyaH Sabdoyatra SravaRayogyaSabdaDAre vayvAdO karRaSrave nile rAtrO divA pAMSusamUhane manuH
karRadarpaRa pu karRe darpaRa iva karRaBUzaRaBede kAnataqkA trikA
karRadunduBi pu karRe dunduBiriva tattulyaDvanihetutvAt SatapadyAm kARqAi SabdamA tasyAH karRapraveSe hi dunduBivadDvAnajananAttasyAstaTAtvam

karRagataroga pu karRe gatorogaH suSrutokte karRa gate rogaBede tadBedanidAnAdi tatrEvoktaM yaTA aTAtaH karRagatarogavijYAnoyamaDyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH karRaSUlaM praRAdaSca bADiryyaM kzveqa eva ca karRasrAvaH karRakaRqUH karRagUTa staTEva ca kfmi karRapratInAhO vidraDi rdviviDa staTA karRapAkaH pUtikarRa staTEvArSaScaturvviDam taTArvvudaM saptaviDaM SoTaScApi caturvviDaH ete karRagatArogA azwAviMSatirIritAH samIraRaH Srotragato nyaTAcaraH samantataH SUlamatIva karRayoH karoti dozESca yaTAsvamAvftaH sa karRaSUlaH kaTito durAcaraH yadA tu nAqIz vimArgamAgataH sa eva SabdABivahAsu tizWati SfRoti SabdAn viviDAMstadA naraH praRAda menaM kaTayanti cAmayam sa eva SabdABivahA yadA sirAH kaPAnuyAto pyanusftya tizWati tadA narasyApratikArasevino Bavettu bADiryyamasaMSayaM Kalu SramAtkzatAdrUkzakazAyaBojanAt samIraRaH SabdapaTe vyavasTitaH viriktaSIrzasya ca SItasevinaH karoti hi kzveqazpamatIva karRayoH Siro BiGAtAdaTa vA nimajjato jale prapAkAdaTavApi vidraDeH sravettu pUyaM SravaRo nilAvftaH sakarRasaMsrAva iti prakIrttitaH kaPena kaRqUH pracite Ta karRayorBfSaM Bavet Srotasi karRa saMjYite viSozite SlezmaRi pittatejasA nfRAM Bavet Srotasi karRa gUTakaH sa karRagUTo dravatAM yadAgato vilAyito GrARamuKaM prapadyate tadA sa karRa pratinAhasaMjYito BavedvikAraH Siraso titApanaH yadA tu mUrcCantyaTa vApi jantavaH sfjantyapatyAnyaTavApi makzikAH tadaYjanatvAcCravaRo nirucyateBizagnirAdyEH kfmikarRakastu saH kzatABiGAtapraBavastu vidraDi rBavettaTA dozakfto TavA punaH sa raktapItAruRamasramAsvanetpratodaDUmAyanadAha SvozavAn BavetprapAkaH KaluM pittakopano vikozavikladakaraSca karRayoH sTite kaPe srotasi pittatejasA vilApyamAne BfSasampratApanAt avedano vApyaTavA savedano GanaM sravetpUti sapUtikarRa kaH pradizwaliNgArnyaSAMsi tattvatastaTEva SoTA rbbuda liNga mIritam mayA purastAtprasamIkzya yojayedihEva tAni prayato BizagvaraH
karRahIna tri ta baDire bADiryyaprAptiSca pApaviSezajanyA yaTAha SAtA sa kakaGAto karRahInodadyAdgAmasitapraBAm sarpe ca puM strI cakzuH SravastvAttasya taTAtvam striyAM jAtitvAt NIz
karRajAha na karRasya mUlam karRa jAha karRamUle karRajAhavilocaneti BawwiH

column3: karRakIwI strI karRRayati Binatti ac svalpaH kIwaH alpArTe NIp kAwI karmma SatapadyAm kARqAi hemaca

column2: karRakaRqU strI ta karRagatarogaBede karRamatarogaSabde vivftiH
karRakzveqa pu ta suSrutokte karRagatarogaBede karRagatarogaSabde vivftiH
karRala tri karRaH karRaSaktirastyasya siDmA Rac praSastaSravaRaSaktiyukte
karRalatA strI karRasya lateva karRaM pAlyAm kARerapAtA svArTe kan ata ittvam karRalatikApi taDArTe hema

karRamala na ta karRasTe malAkAre padArTe kARera Kala hArA karRamalotpattiprakAraH BAvapra ukto yaTA tato mAMsAgninA punaH pacyamAnaH paYcAhorAtrAt sArdDadaRqAMSca yAvanmAMsezveva tizWati tataH pacyamAnAttasmAn malaM nirgacCatI tadvyAnavAyunA kzipraM kaRavigatya karRaviqBavati karRaviqAdayo pyatra
karRamo wi wI strI karRaM mowayati in vA NIp durgABede hema
karRanAda pu karRe aNgulyApihitakarRe nAdaH DvaniBedaH aNgutyApihitakarRe Boz BOz ityAkAre maDyamASabdasvarUpe DvaniBede maDyamA SrutigocarA ityuktestasyAstaTAtvam
karRapAka pu suSrutokte karRarogaBede karRagatarogaSabde vivftiH

karRapAlyAmaya pu ta karRavyaDadozaje suSrutokte karRapAlirogaBede sa ca suSrute sopadravo darSitaH yaTA karRapAlyAmayAnnFRAM punarvvakzyAmi suSruta karRapAlyAM prakupitA vAtapittakaPAstrayaH dviDA vApyaTa saMsfzwAH kurvvanti viviDA rujaH visPowaH stabDatA SoTaH pAlyAM doze tu vAtike dAhavisPowajananaM SoTaH pAkaSca pEttike kaRqUH saSvayaTustamBo gurutvaYca kaPAtmake yaTAdozaYca saMSoDya kuryyAttezAM cikitsitam KedAByaNgaparIzekEH pralepAsfgvimokzaREH mfdvIM kriyAM vfMhaRIyEryaTAsvaM BojanEstaTA ya evaM vetti dozARAM cikitsAM karttumarhati ata UrdDaM nAmaliNgErvvakzyepAlyAmupadravAt utpAwakaScotpuwaka SyAnaH kaRqUyuto BfSam avamanTaH sakaRqUko granTiko jambulastaTA srAvI ca dAhavAMScEva SfRvazAM kramaSaH kriyAm
karRapAya pu deSaBede sa ca vf saM nErftyAmuktaH nErftyAM diSi deSAH ityupakramya karRaprAyapAraSavaSUdrAH

karRapUra pu karRaM pUrayati pUra aR karRABaraRe nIlotpale SirIzavfkze mediniH aSokavfkze rAjani etezAM puzpEH strIkarRasya BUzA BavatIti tezAM taTAtvam yasyAScOraScikuranikuraH karRapUromayUraH prasannarA praBlAnabIjANkurakarRapUraH vilambinIlotpalakarRapUrA raGuH

karRapUraRa na ta suSrutokteH tElAdinA karRasya pUraRe snehasAro yaM puruzaH prARASca snehaBUyizWAH snehasADyAScaBavanti snehohi pAnAnuvAsanamastizkaSirovasatyUttara vastinasya karRapUraRagAtrAByaNgaBojanezUpayojyaH suSru
karRapUraka pu karRaM pUrayati pUra Rvul kadambavfkze rAjani svArTe kan karRABaraRe nIlotpale SirIzavfkze aSokavfkze ca rAjani etezAM puzpEH strIkarRasya BUzA BavatIti tezAM taTAtvam
karRapaTa yu karRa eva panTAH ac samA karRaranDrarUpe SabdapraveSanayogye mArge
karRaparAkrama pu apaBraMSayogyabuhucCandoyukte kAvyaBede

karRaparamparA strI ta SravaRaparamparAyAm kARAkARi tenEva ca krameREza gataH karRaparamparAm pravAdobahulIBAvaM sarvvatrApi pure yayO kaTAsaritsA ekasya sakASAdanyena SrutvA nyasmE kaTane tenApi punaranyasmE kaTane evaM parampayyA SravaRe asya vfttiH

karRaparvan na BAratAntargate azwame parvvaRi tatparvvaRi kaTAsaMgrahaSca BA A a yaTA ataH paraM karRaparva procyate paramAdButam sAraTyeviniyogaSca madrarAjasyaDImataH AKyAnaM yatra pOrARAM tripurasya nipAtanam prayARe paruzaScAtra saMvAdaH kaRa SalyayoH haMsakAkIyamAKyAnaM taTEvAkzepasaMBftam baDaH pARqasya ca taTA aSvatTAmnA mahAtmanA daRqasenasya ca tato daRqasya ca vaDastaTA dvEraTe yatra karRena DarmarAjo yuDizWiraH saMSayaM gamito yudDe mizatAM sarvaDanvinAm anyonyaM prati ca kroDo yuDizWirakirIwinoH tatrEvAnunayaH proktomADavenArjjunasya hi pratijYApUrvakaYcApi vakzoduHSAsanasya ca BittvA vfkodaro raktaM pItavAnatra saMyuge dvEraTe yatra pArTena hataH karRo mahAraTaH azwamaM parva nirdizwametadBAratacintakEH ekonasaptatiH proktA aDyAyAH karRaparvaRi catvAryyeva sahasrARi navaSlokaSatAni ca catuHzazwistaTA SlokAH parvaRyasmin prakIttitAH karRaparvaRyapi taTA BojanaM sArvvakAmikam vipreByaH saMskftaM satyagdadyAt saMyatamAnasaH BA svargA a
karRapatraka pu patramiva kAyati kE ka karRe patraka iva karRapAlyAm kanInike cAkzikUwe SazkulI karRa patrakO karRO SaNKO BruvO dantAvezwAvozWO kakundare yAjYa karRapatrakO karRapAlyO mitA
karRapiSAcI strI devIBede tantrasAre mUlaM dfSyam

column3: karRapraRAda pu karRRagatarogaSabde suSrutokte karRRarogaBede

column2: karRapratinAha karRarogaBede karRagatarogaSabde vivftiH
karRapura na ta ac samA campAnagaryyAm hemaca
karRapuzpa pu karRa iva puzpaM yasya morawAlatAyAm rAjani
karRasPowA strI karRe sPowo vidAraRaM yasyAH kARaPAwA latABede rAjani karRasPowA kawustiktA himA ca parikIrttitA sarvvagrahaBUtavizadozavyADivinASinIH rAjani
karRasU strI karRaM sUte sU kvip pfTAyAM kuntyAm tat prasavakaTA karRa Sabde uktA karRajananyAdayo pyatra
karRasaMsrAva pu karRarogaBede karRagatarogaSabde vivftiH

karRasrotoBava pu karRa strotaso vizRukarRa malAdBavati BU ac BavatyasmAt apAdAne ap karRasroto Bavoyasya vA vizRukarRamalodBUte maDunAmake kEwaBanaHmake cAsure karRa sroto BavaYcApi maDuM nAma mahAsuram tamugramugrakarmmARamugrAM budDiM samAsTitam brahmaRo pacitiM kurvvan jaGAna puruzottamaH BA anu pra yaTAcAsya vizRukarRAdudBavaH taTA kEwaBaSabde vakzyate
karRastrotas na karRasya srota iva karmmamale
karRatAla qa pu ta tasya la vA karRatAqane anftyata sPuwakftakarRatAlayA mAGaH
karRavaMSa pu karRaH karRAkArovaMSoyatra maYce hArA tasya pAdezu vaMSAkAratvAttaTAtvam
karRavarjjita tri ta baDire kAlA SrotraSUnye sarpe pu strI Sabdaca striyAM jAtO NIz tasya cakzuH SravastvAttaTAtvam bADiryaYca SravaRaSaktiSUnyatvam

pUrba rva BAva pu pUrbo BAvaH pUrbavarttitve kAraRatve yena saha pUrbaBAyaH kAraRamAdAya vA yasyaBAzA kurma pUrvavarttini BAve padArTaDarmaBede SfNgArarasasya pUrvarAgAparaparyAye BAvaBede

pUrba rva Ba BA drapadA Badrasya vfzasyeva padaM caraRamasya tasyedamaR vA karma aSvinyAdizu paYcaviMSatitamanakzatre tatsvarUpAdikaM aSlezASabde uktam
pUrba rva PalgunI strI aSvinyAdizu ekAdaSe nakzatre aSlezASabde ekAdaSe nakzatre tadISAdi dfSyam

pUrba rva deva pu pUrbe rve devAH asure amaraH tezAM praTamaM devatvena jAyamAnatve pi anyAyAcaraRAt tato BrazwAnAM dEtyaBAvaM prAptiriti pOrARikI kaTAnusanDeyA karma pUrbatanayoH devayoH naranArAyaRayoH dvi va BA u a

pUrba rva digvadana na pUrvadiSi vadanasya digbadanaSabde ukte mezasahaDanUrUparASitrike

pUrba rva ja pu pUrvasmin kAle jAyate jana qa jyezWaBrAtari raGuH jyezWaBaginyAM strI amaraH pUrbakAlajAtamAtre tri jyezWAmUlIyamicCanti mAsamAzAQa pUrba rva jam candralokasTe divyapitfgaRe aTa pUrba rva jAH pitaraScandragolasTA nyastaSastrAH svaDABujaH kavyabAlAdayaste ca trikA pitAmahAdO sa pUrba rva jAnAM kapilena rozAt raGuH

pUrba rva kAlika tri pUrba rvaH kAlaH sADanatayA styasya Wan pUrba rva kAlasADye darSanaM pUrba rva kAlikamBA sa sO a pUrba rva kAle BavaH WaYi vfdDiH pOrvya rba kAlika ityeva tatrArTe tri striyAM NIp iti BedaH

pUrba rva pAlin pu pUrbaM deSaM diSaM vA pAlayati pAli Rini pOrastyadeSapatinfpaBede pUrbadigISe indre ca
pUrba rva pAwaliputraka tri pUrbapAwaliputre BavaH vuY na pUrbapadavfdDiH pUrbapAwaliputranagaraBave

pUrba rva pUrba rva tri pUrva vIpsAyAM dvitvam vIpsArTaka pUrbaSabdArTe
pUrba rva pada na karma pUrvavarttini viBaktyante pade pUrbapadAt saYjYAyAmagaH pA pUrvavattisTAne ca pUrvapadamaDIte pUrbottarapadAt vArtti ikan pUrbapadika tadvettaritadaDyAyini ca

pUrba rva pakza pu karma Suklapakze amaraH SAstrIyasaMSayanirAsArTapraSne PakikAyAm sidDAntavirudDakowO vizayo vizayaScEva pUrvapakzastaTottaram ityukta aDikaraRAvayavaBede vyavahAre pratijYAparaparyAye BAzApatrarUpe praTamavAyavaBede tallakzaRAdikaM vIrami uktaM yaTA pUrvapakzaH smftaH pAdo dvitIyaScottarastaTA kriyApAdastftIyastu caturTo nirRayastaTAiti bfhaspativacanasTaM nirRayaPalakaparAmarSarUpapratyAkalitaparameva nirRayapadamupacArAdityAha itaraTA pUrvAdAhftatadvanacanaviroDaH syAt tatra pratijYAvAdIM kaH syAdityapekzite nAradaH rAjYe kuryAt pUrvamAvedanaM pratijYAlakzaRamAha yAjYavalkyaH pratyarTino grato leKyaM yaTAveditamarTanA samAmAsatadardAharnnAmajAtyAdicihnitam arTyAta ityarTaH sADyaH so syAstItyarTI tadviparItaH pratyarTI tasyAgrataH purato leKyaM leKanIyaM sasaByena saBApatinA yaTAveditaM pUrvAvedanamanatikramya yena prakAreRAvedanasamaye svavacanaM leKitaM taTEva pratyarTisamakzamapi na punaranyaTA taTA satyanyavAditvena BaNgaprasaNgAt bahuvacanaM tadIyapitrAdiprAptyarTaM nivAso nikawagfhAdiH pitaro rTipratyarTinoH pIqA pratiBUpaBftInAM DanikAdikftA AharttA pratigrahAdivizayavastUni AnetA dAyako dAtfvikretrAdiH yAvantyupayujyante tatra tAvantyeva niveSanIyAni sarvARi na sarvatra adfzwArTatvaprasaNgAt tatra varzAdInAM kAlAnAM vfdDiDanadvEguRyAdivivAdena pratigrahakrayAdipOrvAparyavAde vopayogaH ca kzamAliNgAnAmupekzitaparokzaBujyamAnaBUmyAdivivAde AtmapIqAyA fRikapratiBvAdivivAde evamanyadapyunneyam ataevASayAdAha kAtyAyanaH deSaYcEva taTA sTAnaMsanniveSastaTEva ca jAtiH saYjYADivAsaSca pramARaM kzetranAma ca pitfpEtAmahaYcEva pUrvarAjAnukIrttitam sTAvarezu vivAdezu deSEtAni niveSayetiti etezAM tatropayogitvAt hArIto pi AsanaM SayanaM yAnantAmraM kAMsyamayomayam DAnyamaSmamayaM yacca dvipadaYca catuzpadam maRimuktAprabAlAni hIrakA rUpyakAYcanam yadi dravyasamUhaH syAt saNKyA kAryA tadEva tu yasmin deSe ca yaddravyaM yena mAnena mIyate tena tasmiMstadA saNKyA karttavyA vyavahAriBiHiti mAnasaNKyASabdAvatrAnyopalakzaRam atrEtAvadvivakzitaM yatra yAvadupayujyate tatra tAvanniveSyaM BAzApatre anyaTA sADyanirdeSasyApUrRatvAt pakzABAsatApatteraDikaniveSe dfzwArTatApatteriti kAtyAyano rTata evAha deSakAlavihInaSca dravyasaNKyAvivarjitaH kriyAmAnavihInaSca pakzo nAdeya izyate kriyA pramARam mAnaM sADyaparimARam yadyapi pUrvoktapakzalakzaRarahitAnAM sADyaM ca mocayet paScAdarTahInAntu tAM viduH uktaM sADyaM vAdinA yasyAntyajyate sA BAzA rTahInetyarTaH gaRite liKite meye taTA kzetragfhAdizu yatra saNKyA na nirdizwA sA pramARavivarjitA saNKyAnaM saNKyeti pyutpattyA saNKyASabdena gaRanatolanamAnAnAM parigrahaH vidyayA prAptamarTArTaM labDaM krItaM kramAgamat natvevaM liKyate yatra sA BAzA syAdanAgamA samAmAsastaTA pakzastiTirvArastaTEva ca yatrEtAni na liKyante leKyahInAntu tAM viduH avaSyaM yadyatra pUrvoktarItyA leKyaM tadrahitA leKyahInetyarTaH leKayitvA tu tAM BAzAmanirdizwe taTottare nirdiSet sAkziRaH pUrvamaDikAM tAM vinirdiSet sAkziRa iti pramARopalakzaRam vyutkramAdatrADikyantenAprAptakAlatA PalitA yatra syAttu yaTApUrba nirdizwaM pUrbavAdinA sandigDameva leKyena BrazwAM BAzAntu tAM viduH uBayaM pUrbamiti pAWe pakzadvayamapi pratijYAvAdinEva nirdizwaM syAdityarTaH prasaNgAt pakzABAso pi tatra nirRIto tra pradarSyate tatra kAtyAyanaH aprasidDaM nirAbADaM nirarTaM nizprayojanam asADyaM vA virudDaM vA pakzABAsaM vivarjayet aprasidDamAha bfhaspatiHna kenacit kfto yastu so prasidDa udAhftaH yaTA Palasahasrakfzwakzetramapahftamiti madIyaM SaSavizARaM gfhItvA na prayacCatItyAdyaprasidDamityAha kacawatapaYjabagaqadaSaM vA gfhItvA na dadAtItyAdi vijYAnayogI bfhaspativacanAt tvanyaTA nirarTakapadArTaH pratIyate yaTAhasvalpApaparADaH svalpArTo nirarTaka iti smftaHiti etasyodAharaRaM smfticandrikAyAm ahamanena sasmitamIkzitaH mAmakI SikzA nenApahftetyAdi nizprayojanaM yaTAyaM devadatto smadgfhasanniDO suKaramaDIte ityAdi mitAkzarAsmfticandrikayorudAhftam bfhaspatinA taTEva mitAkzarAyAmasADyavirudDAvanyaToktO devadattenAhaM saBrU BaNgamupahasiti ityAdyasADyasADanAsamBavAt alpakAlatvAnna sAkzyAdisamBavo liKitaM dUrato lpatvAnna divyamiti mUkenAhaM Sapta ityAdi virudDamiti smfticandrikodAhftavacanoktA jYeyAH yaTA Binnikramo vyutkramArTaH prakIrRArTo nirarTakaH atItakAlo vidvizwaH pakzo nAdeya izyate yaTAsTAnAniveSena nEva pakzArTakalpanA Sasyate tena pakzaH sa Binnakrama udAhftaH vyatyastAkzarasanniveSo Binnakrama iti yAvat vyupatkramArTo vyavahitAtvayenArTAboDakaH prakIrRArTo saNkalitArTaH mUlamarTaM parityajya tadguRo yatra liKyate nirarTakaH sa vE pakzo BUtasADanavarjitaH BUtakAlamatikrAntaM dravyaM yatra hi liKyate atItakAlaH pakzo sO pramARe satyapi smftaH yasmin pakze dviDA sADyaM BinnakAlavimarSanam vimfzyate kriyA BedaH sa pakzodvizwa ucyate BUtasADanaM mUlaBUtaM sADanaM tena varjitaH BUtakAlaH sADyakAlaH anyAnapi pakzABAsAnAha sa eva anyAkzaraniveSena anyArTagamanena ca Akulantu BavelleKyaM kriyA cEvAkulA Bavet sADanaM saha sADyena pUrba rva rAga puM pUrborAgaH nAyakayormelanAt pUrbajAte anurAgaBede SrAvaRAddarSanAd vApi miTaH saMrUQa rAgayoH daSAviSezo yo prAptO pUrbarAgaH sa ucyate SravaRAntu Bavettatra dUtavandisaKermuKAt indrajAle ca citre ca sAkzAt svapne ca darSanam aBilAzaScintA smftiguRakaTanodvegasampralApASca unmAdo Ta vyADirjaqatA mftiriti daSAtra kAmadaSAH aBilAzaH spfhA cintA prAptyupAyAdicintanam nmAdaScAparicCedaScetanAcetanezvapi alakzyavAk pralApaH syAt cetaso BramaRadBfSam vyADistu dIrGaniHSvAsaH pARqutAkfSatAdayaH jaqatA hInacezwatvamaNgAnAM manasastaTA rasavicCedahetutvAnmaraRaM nEva varRyate jAtaprAyantu tadvAcyaM cetasA cApi kANkzitam varRyate pi yadi pratyujjIvanaM syAdadUrataH AdO vAcyaH striyA rAgaH puMsaH vaScAttadiNgitEH nIlIkasumBamaYjizWAHpUrbarAgo pi ca triDA na cAtiSoBate yannApEti preme manomatam tannIlIrAgamAKyAnti yaTA kzIrAmasItayoH kusumBarAgaM taM prAhuryadapEti ca SoBate maYjizWirAgamAhustaM yannApEtyatiSoBatesA da

column3: pUrvA rbA di pu pUrvaH Adiryasya vyavasTAyAmasaMjYAyAM sarva nAmakarmanimitte SabdagaRe sa ca gaRaH pUrva para avara da kziRa uttara apara sva antara pUrvAdiByo navaByo vA pA pUrve pUrvA ityAdi pUrvA AdiryaKyAH pUrvAdikakumi strI

pUrvA rbA hRa pu pUrvamahnaH ekadeSisa wacsamA ahnAdeSaH rAtrAhAhnAntAH puMsi pA puMstvam dinasya pUrvaBAge pUrvAhRaSca triDA viBaktadinasya praTamaBAgaH pUrvAhRo vE devAnAM maDyAhno manuzyARAmiti SrutiH ahnaH praTama praharadvayakAlaSca AvarttanAttu pUrvAhRo hyaparAhRastataH param skandapu AvarttanAt paScimadigvartticCAyAyAH parivarttanam ataeva aSvatTaM vandayennityaM pUrvAhRe praharadveye mala ta

pUrvA rbA para tri dvandva pUrbasmin aparasmin ca deSe tayo rBAvaH zyaY pOrvAparvya tadBAve na kvacinna pUrvapada vfdDiH pUrvAparyya tatrArTe na
pUrvA rbA rdDya tri pUrvArdDe BavaH pakze yat pUrvArdDaBave pakze WaY pOrvA rbA rdDika tatrArTe tri

pUrvA rbA zAQA strI karma aSvinyAdizu viMSe nakzatre tat svarUpAdikamaSlezASabde uktam

column2: <ins>pUrva nimantraRe saka nivAse aka cu uBa sew pUrbayati te apupUrbat ta ozWyAnto yam</ins> pUrva nivAse aka nimantraRe saka BvA pa <del>sew antyasTAnto</del> <ins>sewa antya sTAnto</ins> yam pUrvati apUrvIt pUrva <del>rva</del> <ins>rba</ins> tri <del>pUrva</del> <ins>pUrba</ins> rva ac praTame Adye yasyAM diSi yezAM sUryasya praTamaM dfzwiH tezAM tasyAM diSi strI tadupalakzite deSe yasya yadapekzayA praTamaM janmAdi tasya tAdfSakAle <del>tadulakzite</del> <ins>tadupalakzite</ins> ca tasya digdeSakAlavyavasTAvAcitve <del>sarvanAmakAryaM</del> <ins>sarvanAmakAryyaM</ins> pUrvasmE ityAdi jasi NiNasyostu vA <del>pUrve pUrvAH pUrvasmAt</del> <ins>pUrbe pUrbAH pUrba smAt</ins> pUrvAt <del>pUrve pUrvasmin</del> <ins>pUrba pUrbasmin</ins> striyAM tu na viBAzA <del>pUrvasyE pUrvasyAm</del> <ins>pUrbasyE zUrbasyAm</ins> ityAdi sarvanAmatvena vfttimAtre <del>rU puMvadBAvaH pUrvasyAM sTita pUrvasTitam pUrvasyA</del> <ins>sya puMvad BAvaH pUrbasyAM sTitaM pUrbasTitam pUrbasyA</ins> rUpaM <del>pUrvarUpam</del> <ins>pUrbarUpam</ins> ityAdi
column3: pUrva nimantraRe saka nivAse aka cu uBa sew pUrbayati te apupUrbat ta ozWyAnto yam pUrva nivAse aka nimantraRe saka BvA pa sewa antya sTAnto yam pUrvati apUrvIt pUrva rba tri pUrba rva ac praTame Adye yasyAM diSi yezAM sUryasya praTamaM dfzwiH tezAM tasyAM diSi strI tadupalakzite deSe yasya yadapekzayA praTamaM janmAdi tasya tAdfSakAle tadupalakzite ca tasya digdeSakAlavyavasTAvAcitve sarvanAmakAryyaM pUrvasmE ityAdi jasi NiNasyostu vA pUrbe pUrbAH pUrba smAt pUrvAt pUrba pUrbasmin striyAM tu na viBAzA pUrbasyE zUrbasyAm ityAdi sarvanAmatvena vfttimAtre sya puMvad BAvaH pUrbasyAM sTitaM pUrbasTitam pUrbasyA rUpaM pUrbarUpam ityAdi

pUrva rba citti tri cita BAve ktin pUrvaM rbaM cittiH smaraRaM yasya pUrbAnuBavavizaye yaju ap saro Bede strI harivaM a

pUrva rba deSa pu pUrva rba varttI deSaH jambudvIpasTe deSaBede sa ca deSaH vf saM a kUrmaviBAge darSitaH

arTivAdaH pratijYA vfhaspatiH ahaMpUrvi rva kayA yAtAvarTipratyarTinO yadA vAdo varRA nupUrveRa grAhyaH pIqAmavekzya ceti manurapi arTA narTAvuBO budDA DarmADarmO ca kevalO varRakrameRa sarvARi paSyet kAryyARi kAryyiRAm brAhmaRAdInAM yuga padDarmADikaraRaM prAptAnAM varRAnukrameRa brAhmaRasyAdO tataH kzatriyasyetyevamAdikrameRa catuzpAdvyavahAraH prava rttanIyo rAjYA pIqADikyakAryyagOravaM cedarTipratyarTino ranyatarasya tadA na pUrvAvedanakramo nApi varRakramaH yadA tu sarve savarRAstadA AvedanakramaH yugapadAvedane sa mAnavarRatve samAnapIqatve ca sasaByasaBApatIcCayeti Page a nirgalito rTaH pratijYAlakzaRamAha yAjYavalkyaH pratya rTino grato leKyaM yaTAveditaBarTinA samAmAsatada rdDAhannomajAtyAdicihnitam arTyata ityaTaH sADyaH so syAstItyarTI tadviparItaH pratyarTI tasyAgrataH purato leKyaM leKanIyaM sasaByena saBApatinA yaTA veditaM pUrbAvedanamanatikramya yena prakAreRAvedanasamaye sva vacanaM leKitaM taTEva pratyarTisamakzamapi na punaranyaTA taTA satyanyavAditvena BaNgaprasaNgAt anTavAdItyAdi hAnalakzaRe vakzyate prAgevArTinA svapratijYAtArTasya liKitatvAdaDumA leKanamanarTakamityASaNkAnirAsAyAha samAmAseti sahitaM liKyata iti nAnarTakyamiti BAvaH Adi SabdagrAhyARi ca kAtyAyana Aha niveSya kAlaM varzaM ca mAsaM pakzaM tiTiM taTA belAM pradeSaM vizayaM sTAnaM jAtyAkftI vayaH sATyaM pramARaM dravyaYca rAjYe tadBAzetyaBi DIyate iti arTavat prayojanavat DarmasaMyuktam alpAkzarapraBUtArTatvAdiguRayuktam paripUrRamaDyAhArA dyanapekzam anAkulamasandigDAkzaram sADyavat sADa nIyArTayutam vAcakapadam pfTivI strI praTate vistArameti praTa zivan zavan vA ni samprasAraRaM zittvAt NIz pfzo vA hrasvaH DarAyAm kzitO tadguRAdikaM yaTA rUpadravatvapratyakzayogi syAt praTamatrikam guruRI dve rasavatI dvayornEmittikodravaH sparSAdayo zwO vegaSca dravyatvaYca gurutvakam rUpaM rasastaTA sneho vAriRyete caturdaSa snehahInA ganDayutA kzitAvete caturdaSa tatra kzitirganDaheturnAnArUpavatI matA zaqviDastu rasastaya ganDo pi dviviDo mataH sparSastu tasyA vijYeyo hyanuzRASItapAkajaH nityA nityA ca sA dveDA nityA syAdaRulakzaRA anityA tu tadanyA syAt sEvAvayavayoginI sA ca triDA Baveddeha indriyaM vizayastaTA yonijAdirBaveddehamindriyaM GrARalakzaRam vizaye dvyaRukAdistu brahmARqAnta udAhftaHBAzApA tasyA aDyAtmAdiBedA yaTA pfTivI paYcamaM BUtaM GrARaYcADyAtmamucyate aDiBUtaM taTA ganDo tadvirudDamataM SfRu UcatustO purA vizRuM tuzwO yudDena tejasA AvAM jahi na yatrorvI pATasA saMvfteti ca tayorjIvanakAle ca pratyakzA sA Bavat sPuwam tato baBUva medaSca maraRasyAntarantayoH medinIti ca viKyAtetyuktAM yEstanmataM SfRu jalOtA kfSA pUrvaM vardDitA medasA yataH kaTayAmi ca tajjanma sArTakaM sarvasammatam purA SrutaM yad SrutyuktaM DarmavaktrAcca puzkare mahAvirAw SarIrasya jalasTasya ciraM sPuwam malo baBUva kAlena sarvANgavyApako Druvam sa ca pravizwaH sarvezAM tallomnAM vivarezu ca kAlena mahatA tasmAdbaBUva vasuDA mune pratyekaM pratilomnAYca kUpezu sA sTirA sTitA AvirBUtA tiroBUtA sA jale ca punaH punaH AvirBUtA sfzwikAle tajjaloparyavasTitA pralaye ca tidiroBUtA jalAByantaravasTitA prativiSvezu vasuDA SElakA nanu saMyutA saptasAgarasaMyuktA saptadvIpayutA satI hi prajAviSudDyarTaM striyo rakzet prayatnataH iti yAdfSaM puruzamftukAle strI manasA Bajate tatsamAna SIlaM putraM janayatIti pUrvArdDArTaH ataevAhatuH SaNKaliKitO yasman BAveo rpataH strIRAmArttava tacCIlaM janayantIti mAnasavyaBicArAdapi striyaM rakzediti SezaH taTAM ca manunA tasmAdatyAdinotta rArdDenAyamevArTo darSitaH parirakzaRopAyAnAha manu reva arTasya saMgrahe canAM vyaye cEva niyojayet SOce Darme ca paktyAYca pAriRAhyamya cakzaRa iti arTasya saMgrahe svena samAnItArTasaMviDAne vyaye svenokta vyaye SOce gfhAdiSudDikarasaMmAjanApalepanAdO Darme agnihotrAdyanukUlalOkikavyApAre paktyAM saMmkAre gfhopasakararakzaRe SOcAgnikAryye saMyojyAH strIRAM SudDiriyaM smftA iti evaviDavyApArA saktacittatayA sADvya iti vyapadiSyanta ityAha manuH AtmAnamAmanA yAstu rakzeyustAH surakzitAH iti AtmanA gfhavyApArAsaktenAntaHkaraRena sura kzitAH sADyaH AptapuruzArakzitastu striyo na samyagrakzitA ityAha sa eva arakzatA gfhe rudDAH puruzErAptakAriBiH iti AptakAriBiH puruzEH gfhe rudDA ityanvayaH AptASca te kAriRaScAptakAriRaH arakzitAH samyagrakzAvihInA ityarTaH BartturdDarma nizWatvamopi svIRAM rakzaRopAya iti darSayituM sa evAha yAdfgguRena BarttA strI saMyujya ta yaTAviDi necCayAtmanaH tAM sADvIM viBfyAnnityaM devAnAM priya mAcaran devErdattA devadattA dEvavaSAdAyAteti yAvat tAM BAryAM svayaMvare patirvindate tatra svavyApArABAvA ddevadattAmityanena vivAhalakzaRasya strIpuMsayoH sambanDasya na svADInatvaM kintahi devakftatvamiti darSitam deva Page b dattatvaYca strIRAm somodadadganDarvAya ganDarvo dadadagnaye rayiSca putrAMScAdadagnirmahyamaTo imAm ityAdiByaH Sruti vAkyaByo vagamyate tena devErdattAyA aBaraRena dAtFRAM devAlAM drAha ApAdyata ityarTavAda ityuktaM madanaratna na ca sADvomityasya patibratAmityarTaparatvena vyaBi cAriRyA BaraRamanAvaSyakamiti vaktavyam tasyA api kadannAdinA vaSyaBaraRAyatvAt taTA ca nAradaH vyaBicAre striyAmORqyamaDaHSayanameva ca kada nnaYca kuvAsaSca karma cAvaskarojJanama iti striyAra tyarTaM vyaBicAre jAte muRqanamaDaHSayanaYca sADayeta kadannaM kavAsaSca BaraRArTaM dadyAt ameDyaSoDanarUpaM karma kArayedirtyarTaH dozarahitAyA BAryAyAH pari tyAgiBaM pratyAha nAradaH anukUnABavAgdazwAM dakzAM sADvoM prajAvatIm tyajan BAryAmavasTApyA rAjYA daRqena BUyasA iti vizRurapi nirdIzAM pari tyajan patnIYceti cOravacCAsya ityanuzaNgaH nirdozA ntyAgahetuBUtadAzarahitAm daRqena sTApayitu maSakye tvAca column2: strIsaNgrahaRa na striyAH saNgrahaRaM yatra parastrIharaRarUpe vivAdapadaBede tatsvarUpAdikaM vIrami darSita yaTA aTa strIsaNgrahaRAKyaM vyavahArapadam tasya trEviDyamAhe bfhaspatiH pApamUlaM saNgrahaRaM triprakAraM niveData balopaDikfte dve tu tftIyamanurAgajam iti etezAM svarUpaM darSayati sa eva anicCantyA yat kriyate mattonmattapramattayA vilapantyA vA rahasi balAtkArakftantu tat CadmanA gfhamAnIya datvA svaM madakAraRam saMyogaH kriyate yatra tattUpaDikftaM viduH anyonyaYcakzUrAgeRa dUtIsaMprezaRena vA kftaM rUpArTaloBena jYeyaM tadanurAgajam iti anurAgaja saNgrahasya triviDatvaM darSayati sa eva tatpunastriviDaM proktaM praTamaM maDyamottamam iti vyAso pi saNgrahastriviDojYeyaH praTamomaDyamastaTA uttamaSceti SAstrezu lakzaRaM ca pfTak pfTak iti etezAM svarUpamAhaturvyAmabfhaspatI kawAkzAvekzaRaMhAsyaM dUtIsaMprezaRaM taTA sparSoBazaRavastrARAM praTamaH saNgrahaH smftaH prezaRaM ganDamAlyAnAM PalaDUpAnnavAsasam samBAzaRaYca rahasi maDyamaM saNgrahaM viduH ekaSayyAsanaM krIqA cumbanAliNganaM taTA etat saNgrahaRaM proktamuttamaM SAstravediBiH iti strIsaNgrahaRasya jYAnopAyamAha yAjYavalkyaH pumAn saNgrahaRe grAhyaH keSAkeSi parastriyA sadyo vA kAmajEScihnEH pratipattO dvayostaTA iti paraBAryayA saha keSAkeSi krIqanena sadyaH aBinavEH kAmajEH kararuhadaSanAdikftavraRAdiliNgErdvayoH sampratipattAvayaM strIsaNgrahaRavAn iti pratipattavya ityarTaH upAyAntaramAha sa eva nIvIstanaprAvaraRasakTikeSAvamarSanam adeSakAla samBAzaH sahEkasTAname ca iti kurvARa iti SezaH sakTi UruH manurapi striya spfSedadeSe yaH spfzwo vA marzayet tayA parasparasyAnumate sarvaM saNgrahaRaM smftam yastu darpAdinA mayeyaM Bukteti vadati so pi taTAviDatvena grAhya ityAhaturmanunAradO darpAdvA yadi vA mohAt SlAGayA vA svayaM vadet pUrvaM BayeyaM Bukteti tacca saNgrahaRaM smftam iti balAtkArakftasya strIsaNgrahaRasya sAhasAntaBUtatvena tatrEva darsitatvAdupaDikfte daRqamAha bfhaspatiH darpAnnA kAmayedyastu tasya sarvaharodamaH aNgayitvA BagANkena purAnnirvAsayettataH iti sarvaharaH sarvasvaharaH etat sajAtoya vizayam hInotkfzwAgamane tu krameRArdDaM DanaM sarvasvaharaRarUpo baDasahitasarvasvaharaRarUpo vA daRqo vagantavyaH damAneyaH samAyAnviti sAhasavAdinirUpaRa darSitavacanAt tatra vacane puruzasyApakarzaH BAve yuko daRqi na striyA iti noktastasyAH daRqaH tena sAhasa strIsaNgrahaRavat prakfte pi sajAtIyApaBuktAyAH saMvyavahAryAyAH prAyaScittAcaraRAnantara punarapi tenopaBuktAyA iti jYAtavyamityuktaM madanaratne anurAgajatriviDa saNgrahaRe daRqamAha sa eva trayARAmapi cEtezAM praTamo maDyamottamO vinayaH kalpanoyaH syAdaDikodraviRADikaH iti aDikaH praTamasAhasAdiByA DikaH samBoge daRqamAha yAjYavalakyaH svajAtAvuttamA daRqa Anulomye tu maDyamaH prAtilomye baDaH puMsA nAryAH karRAdikarttanam iti caturRAmapi varRAnAM balAtkAreRa sajAtoyaparaBAryAgamane sASItipaRasahasro daRqaH yadA tyAnulomyena hInajAtIyAgamanaM tadA maDyamamAhamaH utkfzwajAtIyAgamane ganturbaDaH tasyAH karRAdikartanamityarTaH etaccAnura gajagrahaRavizayaM striyA api daRqABiDAnAt balAtkaropaDikftayostu striyA anaparADitvena daRqABAvAt asmAdeva prAtilomyena gamane puruzasya baDaM viDAya striyAstadardDatulyakarRanAmAdikarttanaviDAnAt sajAtIyAgamane puruzasya yAvuktAvuttamamaDyamasAhasO daRqO tadardDaM striyAdaRqa iti sUcitam ata eva kAtyAyanaH sarvezu cAparADezu puMsohyarTadamastaTA tadardDaM yozito dadyurbaDe puMsA Ngakarttanam iti striyA iti SezaH yadA punaH savarRAmaguptAm Anulomyena guptAM vA vrajati tadA viSezamAha manuH sahasraM brAhmaRo daRqyo guptAM viprAM balAdu vrajan SatAni paYca daRqyaH syAdicCantyA saha saNgataH sahasraM brAhmaRo daRqaM dApyo gupte tu te vrajan SUdrAyAM kzatriyaviSoH sahasrantu BaveddamaH iti te kzatriyavESye patacca gurusaKiBAryAdivyatiriktavizayam tatra daRqAntaraviDAnAt tadAha nAradaH mAtA mAvfzvasA SvaSrUrmAtulAnI pitfpvasA pitfvyasaKiSizyastrI BaginI tatsaKI snuzA duhitA cAryaBAryA ca sagotrA SaraRAgatA rAjYo pravajitA DAtrI sADvI varRottamA ca yA SiSrasyAtkarttanAlatra nAnyodaRqo viDIyate iti yattu prAtilomyena gamane kzatriyAdeH puruzasya vaDa ityuktaM yogISruravacane taduguptAvizayamanyaTA SedaRqaH taTA ca manuH uBAvapi hi tAveva brAhmaRyA guptayA saha viplutO SUdrakaddaRqO dagDavyO vA kadAgninA brAhmaRI yadyaguptAntu mevetAM vESyapArTivO vESyampaYcaSata kuryAt kzAtrayantu sahasriRam iti paYcaSatampaRaSatapaYcakadaRqaBAjamityarTaH eva sahasriRamityatrApi kzatriyasya guptavESyAgamane vESyasya ca guptakzatriyAgamane krameRa paRasahasrapaRaSatapaYcakaM tayordaRqa ityAha sa eva veSyaScet kzatriyANguptAM vESyAM vA kzatriyo vrajet yo brAhmaRyAmaguptAyAntAbuBO daRqamarhataH iti SUdrasyAguptotkfzwastrIgamane liNgacCedanasarvasvApaharaRe guptAgamane tu baDasarvasvApahArO taTA ca sa eva SUdro guptasamuptaM vA dvEjAtaM varRamAcaran aguptEkANgasarvasvo guptO sarveRa hIyate iti ayaYca baDAdyupadeSaH prajApAlanADikArAdrAjYa eva na dvijAtimAtrasya brAhmaRaH parIkzArTamapi SastraM nAdadoteti SastragrahaRasya nizidDatvAt yadA tu rAjYo nivedane kAlavilambena kAryAtipAtastadA dvijAtimAtrasyApi SastragrahaRe DikAro styeva SastraM dvijAtiBirgrAhyaM Darmo yatroparuDyate nAtatAyibaDe dozo hanturBavati kaScana pracCannaM vA prakASaM vA manyustaM manyumfcCati iti Sastra grahaRAByanujYAnAt parastriyA saha samBAzaRa karturdaRqamAha manuH parasya patnyA puruzaH saMlApaM yojayet saha pUrvasAkzArito dozEH prApnuyAt pUrvamAhasam iti AkzAritaH aBiSastaH dozaH nAnAstyupaBogavAYCABiH pApabudDyA yaH samBAzaRaM karoti tadvizayametat ata eva yastvanAkzAritaH pUrvamaBiBAzeta kAraRAt na dozaM prApnuyAt kiYcinna hi tasya vyatikramaH iti manubfhaspatyuktapUrvasAhasa maDyamasAhasayorutkfzwamajAtIyAsamBAzaRAdiyizayatvena vyavasTA parikalpanIyA parapuruzeRa saha pitrAdiBirnizidDaM samBAzaRaM yA karoti sA paRaSataM daRqyA parastriyA saha pitrAdiBirnizidDasamBAzaRaM yaH puruzaH karoti paRaSatadvayaM daRqanIyaH dvayorapi nizidDaparasparasamBAzaRAdi kurvatoH sammoge yo daRqaH sa eva daRqa ityAha yAjYavalkyaH strI nizeDe SataM dadyAtu dviSatantu damaM pumAn pratizeDe tayordaRqo yaTA grahaRe taTA iti niziDyata iti nizeDaH karmaRi halaSceti vaY cAraRAdistrIvyatiriktavizayametat nEza cAraRadarezu viDirnAtmopajIvizu sakzayanti hi te nArIrnigUQAScArayanti ca iti manusmaraRAt nawAH AtmopajIvinaH veSopajIvinaH etezAM dArezu eva viDine aBiBAzaRAdinimittakadaRqaviDirna paranare nArIH svaBAryAM sajjayanti puruzAntara saMyojanti pracCaNBIkftya cArayanti vetyarTaH sADAraRastrIgamane daRqamAha yAjYavalkyaH avarudDAsude sIzu BujizyAsu taTEva ca gasyasvapi pumAndApyaH paYca SatpaRikandamam iti svAminA yA SuSrUzArTaM gfhe eva sTAtavyamityevaM puruzAntaropraBAmato nirudDAstAH avarudDAH puruzAntareRAvaruDya BujyamAnA BujajizyAH yA dAsyo BujizyA avarudDA vA tAsu sarvapuruzagamyAsvapi gamane paYcASatpaRaM daRqyaH tAmAsparaparigfhItatvena parastrItulyatvAt caSabdAdveSyAKEriRInAmapi grahaRam yAsvapi sarvapuruzasADAraRIsu paraparigfhItAsu gamane yameva daRqa iti mantavyam etadavABipretyAha nArado pi svEriRfbrAhmaRI veSyA dAsI nizkAsinI ca yA gamyAH syurAnulomyena striyo na pratilomataH Asveva tu BujizyAsu dozaH syAtparadAravat gamyAsvapi hi nopeyAdyattAH paraparigrahAH iti abrAhmaRIti svEriRyApiSezaRam svEriRI svatantrApaMScalI nizkAsinI kuwumbAnnirgateti madanaratne svAmyanavarudDA dAsIti vijYAneSvaramADavAcAryapraBftayaH BujizyA svA sveti sambanDaH vyAso pi paroparudDAgamane paYcASatpaRiko damaH prasadDya veSyAgamane daRqo daSapaqya smftaH iti prasahya vetanadAnaM vinA atrAnavarudDAsu veSyAdizu gamyatvABiDAnanna pApABAvapratipAdanArTaM kintu rAjadaRqABAvapratipAdanArTam paSuveSyAdigamane prAjApatyaM viDIyate ityAdivacanEH prAyaScittasmaraRAt balAtkAreRa anavarudDadAsyaBigamane daRqamAha yAjYavalkyaH prasahya dAsyaBigame daRqo daSapaRaH smftaH bahUnAM yadyakAmAsO caturviMSatikaH pfTak iti puruzasamBogajIvikAsu dAsIzu svEriRyAdizu SulkadAnamantareRa balAtkAreRABigacCato daSapaRo daRqaH yadyanicCantImekAmbalAtkAreRa bahavo gacCanti tarhi pratyekaM caturviMSatipaRAtmako daRqa ityarTaH yadi punaH sA svecCayA BAwakaM gfhItvA paScAnnecCati tadA balAduvrajatAmapi bahUnAmadozaH vAdatasyA vyADyadyaBiBavo na Bavet ata eva nAradaH vyADitA saSramA vyagrA rAjakarmaparAyaRA AmantritA cennAgacCedadaRqyA baqavA smftA iti pAradArya prasaNgAt kanyAyAmapi daRqamAha yAjYavalkyaH alaNkftAM haran kanyAmuttamaM tvanyaTA Damam daRqaM dadyAt savarRAsu pratilomye baDaH smftaH iti alaNkftAM vivAhABimuKIM tAM savarRAM kanyAmapaharan uttama sAhasaM daRqanIyaH tadanaBimuKIM haran praTamasAhasam utkfzwavarRajAtAM harataH kzatriyAderbaDa ityarTaH Anulomyena sakAmAharaRe na daRqastaTA ca sa eva sakAmAsvanulomAsu na dozastvanyaTA damaH iti kanyAdUzaRe daRqamAha sa eva dUzaRe tu karacCeda uttamAyAM baDaH smftaH SataM strIdUzaRe dadyAt dve tu miTyABiSaMsane iti paSUn gacCan SataM dApyo hInAM strINgAYca maDyamam iti yadyakAmAM kanyAnnaKakzatAdinA prasahya dUzayati tadA karacCedaH yadA tu aNguli prakzepeRa tAmeva yonikzatAM kurvan dUzayati tadA viSezamAha manuH aBizahya tu yaH kanyAM kuryAddarpeRa mAnavaH tasyASu karttye aNgulyO daRqaYcArhati zaw Satam iti sakAmadUzaRe pyAha sa eva sakAmAM dUzayan kanyAM nANgulicCedamarhati dviSataM tu damaM dApyaH prasaNgavinivfttaye iti yadA kanyA vidagDA vA kanyAM dUzayati tadApyAha sa eva kanyEva kanyAM yA kuryAttasyAstu dviSato damaH yA tu kanyAM prakuryAt strI sA sadyo mORNyamarhati aNgulyorevapa vA DvedaH KareRodvahanantaTA iti kuryAt yonikzatavatImiti SezaH yadA punarutkfzwajAtIyAM kanyAM sakAmAmakAmAM vABigacCati tadA hInasya kzatriyAderbaDaH yadA sakAmAM savarRAmaBigacCati tadA SulkaM gomiTunaM tatpitre dadyAt anicCati tasmin daRqarUpeRa rAjYe dadyAt savarRAmakAmANgacCato baDa eva tadAha manuH uttamAM sevamAnastu jaGanyovaDamarhati SulkaM dadyAt sevamAnaH mamAmicCeta pitA yadi yo kAmAM dUzayet kanyAM sa sadyo baDamarhati sakAmAM dUzayaM stulyo na baDaM prApnuyAnnaraH iti cARqAlyAdigamane daRqamAha yAjYavalakyaH antyAbigamane tvaNkyaM kuvarRena pravAsayet SUdrastaTAntya eva syAdantyasyAryAgame baDaH iti antyA cARqAlI tadgamane trEvarRikAn prApaSciTAM nABimuKAn sahasraM tvantyajastriyamiti manuvacanAnumAreRa paRasahasraM daRqayitvA kutsitavarRena BagAkAreRANkayitvA svarAdrAnnirvAsayet SUdraH punaScaRqAlINgacCaRqAla eva aNkya eveti mADavIye pAWaH cARqAlasya tUtkfzwajAtistryaBigamane baDa evetyarTaH yonivyatirikta sTale gacCato daRqamAha sa eva ayonO gacCato yozAM puruzaM vA BimohataH caturviMSatiko daRqastaTA prajitAgame iti yastu yozAM suKAdAvaBigacCati puruzaM vABimuKaM mohati taTA pravrajitAM vA gacCati asO gacCataH puruzasya yo daRqastadardDaM daRqyA
